translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[sirens wailing in distance]
translation.zh: （如果不是 也要假装是-拳王阿里）

translation.en: [Chris Colbert] ♪ Whoop! Whoop! It's the sound of the police ♪
translation.zh: 呼啸！警察的声音

translation.en: ♪ Whoop! Whoop! The belly of the beast ♪
translation.zh: 呼啸！野兽的肚子

translation.en: I was a street kid, beating niggas up,
translation.zh: 我小时候在街头混 打过黑人

translation.en: robbing people, stabbing people. I used to do all that. Carried a gun.
translation.zh: 抢过人 捅过人以前常干这种事 还带过枪

translation.en: These people in the streets don't fight no more. They shoot you.
translation.zh: 街上的人不再动手了 他们直接动枪

translation.en: That was the path, in the wrong direction.
translation.zh: 那条路的方向错了

translation.en: ♪ I ain't hating now We the next superstar boy ♪
translation.zh: 我不恨他们！我们是下一个巨星 孩子

translation.en: The whole point of this sport is hit and not get hit.
translation.zh: 这项运动的重点就是击打和不要被打

translation.en: Don't take no unnecessary punishment.
translation.zh: 别挨没必要的惩罚

translation.en: It's how long you can last. And, you know, how smart you can be in this game.
translation.zh: 这项比赛的关键在于你能坚持多久 有多聪明

translation.en: [Cam F. Awesome] You don't need to be angry to fight.
translation.zh: 这不是生气时那种打架

translation.en: Boxing, to me, is a tactical game.
translation.zh: 对于我来说 拳击是一种战术竞技

translation.en: Everything I do is based off logic.
translation.zh: 我所做的一切都是基于逻辑

translation.en: It's, "Can I be smarter?" And manning up when it needs to be done.
translation.zh: 我会问：“我能再聪明点吗？”必要时拿出男子汉的气概

translation.en: But there's so many variables in boxing
translation.zh: 但拳击中变数很多

translation.en: that there's really no such thing as a right thing to do,
translation.zh: 没什么正确的路数可言

translation.en: just a bunch of wrongs.
translation.zh: 只是不断地犯错误

translation.en: [Peter Quillin] To express myself is through a fight.
translation.zh: 搏击就是自我表达的过程

translation.en: I watch for your mistakes, try to beat you to the punch.
translation.zh: 我时刻等着你犯错误让我先发制人 把你打倒

translation.en: There's no formula to winning.
translation.zh: 没什么固定的公式能保证你赢

translation.en: It's a window I'm looking for.
translation.zh: 那是我一直在寻找的一扇窗户

translation.en: That window closes in one second.
translation.zh: 一秒钟窗户就会关闭

translation.en: [announcer] Three two-minute rounds. In the gold corner...
translation.zh: NETFLIX 原创纪录片 三轮两分钟的较量 金色场角…

translation.en: -Jay Bulger! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: （纽约市布朗克斯2001韦伯斯特警察体育联盟）

translation.en: My name is Jay Bulger, and boxing saved my life.
translation.zh: 我叫杰伊巴尔杰 拳击救过我的命

translation.en: I was just an angry kid, getting into fights,
translation.zh: 小时候我是个易怒的孩子常跟人打架

translation.en: headed in the wrong direction.
translation.zh: 曾经误入歧途

translation.en: Then, I walked into a boxing gym,
translation.zh: 后来 我走进拳击馆

translation.en: connected with the trainer,
translation.zh: 跟教练一起练习

translation.en: and I found something to fight for.
translation.zh: 找到了我搏斗的目标

translation.en: To become a New York City Golden Gloves champion.
translation.zh: 那就是成为纽约市金手套拳击赛冠军

translation.en: It was so simple and honest.
translation.zh: 拳击就是这么简单诚实

translation.en: You get up into that ring...
translation.zh: 一旦上了拳击台

translation.en: and you're exposed.
translation.zh: 就是随时准备挨打

translation.en: -You find out what you're really made of. -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 你就知道自己有几斤几两

translation.en: Years later, I've set out to capture the state of boxing in America.
translation.zh: 几年后 我已经开始了解美国拳击界的状态

translation.en: Only to find that so many of the gyms I boxed at...
translation.zh: 结果发现很多我之前去过的拳击馆

translation.en: have closed their doors.
translation.zh: 都已经关门了

translation.en: Today, most kids would rather play basketball or football.
translation.zh: 如今 大多数孩子宁愿玩篮球或橄榄球

translation.en: Do anything but get in the ring.
translation.zh: 参加任何运动 但就是不上拳击台

translation.en: You can't play boxing. It's not a game.
translation.zh: 你不能玩拳击 因为它不是游戏

translation.en: It's a test...
translation.zh: 它是一种考验

translation.en: of how much you can hit...
translation.zh: 考验你能打多久

translation.en: without being hit.
translation.zh: 而不被别人打

translation.en: The brutality is inherent...
translation.zh: 那种残酷是固有的

translation.en: to both its appeal and to its demise.
translation.zh: 这既是拳击的魅力所在也是可怕之处

translation.en: Now, there was a time in America when everybody loved boxing.
translation.zh: 曾几何时 拳击也曾风靡美国

translation.en: When fighters like Dempsey, Louis, Marciano, Ali and Tyson
translation.zh: 那时邓普西 路易斯马西阿诺 阿里和泰森

translation.en: were kings of the world.
translation.zh: 都是世界之王

translation.en: So, for the American fighters who still believe in boxing,
translation.zh: 对于依然相信拳击的美国拳击手来说

translation.en: why do they do it,
translation.zh: 他们为何会做拳击手

translation.en: and what does it take to be champion?
translation.zh: 如何才能成为冠军？

translation.en: All I know is that there will always be the next kid
translation.zh: 我只知道总会有下一个孩子

translation.en: who needs to fight their way out...
translation.zh: 必须站上拳击台

translation.en: by stepping into the squared circle.
translation.zh: 打出一条出路

translation.en: [Colbert] I don't know what I would be doing if not for boxing.
translation.zh: 如果不打拳 我不知道自己会做什么

translation.en: I think I would have been dead or some shit.
translation.zh: 我想我可能已经死了之类的

translation.en: I've been through shoot-outs. I've been through shelter homes.
translation.zh: 我经历过枪战 住过庇护所

translation.en: My life was never easy. My life's still not easy up to this day.
translation.zh: 我的人生从来不易到今天依然不容易

translation.en: -[woman] Get out. -Yeah, a'ight.
translation.zh: -出去-好

translation.en: [woman] Get the fuck out.
translation.zh: 滚出去

translation.en: [Colbert] Shit is hard, like... I don't let it stress me, though.
translation.zh: 生活很难…但我不会让它把我压倒

translation.en: Not one of them people that let that shit bother me.
translation.zh: 没人能把我困住

translation.en: I take that shit and I use it as a motivation
translation.zh: 我会把困难当作动力

translation.en: to push me to be better at what I do.
translation.zh: 逼着我自己把事情做得更好

translation.en: I'ma be the big champion of the world
translation.zh: 我会成为世界冠军

translation.en: and take my family out of the hood and get them into a better place.
translation.zh: 带着家人脱离困境让他们住进更好的地方

translation.en: [Bulger] Eighteen-year-old Christopher "Lil B-Hop" Colbert
translation.zh: 18岁的克里斯多夫“利尔B霍普”科尔伯特

translation.en: is the best amateur boxer in New York City.
translation.zh: 是纽约市最好的业余拳击手

translation.en: He rides the subway, two hours, every day to Flatbush, Brooklyn,
translation.zh: 他每天坐两小时的地铁到布鲁克林的弗莱布许

translation.en: so he can train at the very last free boxing gym in New York City,
translation.zh: 这样他就可以到纽约市最后一个免费的拳击馆训练

translation.en: Atlas Cops and Kids.
translation.zh: 阿特拉斯警察和小孩拳击馆

translation.en: [man] Let's go.
translation.zh: 出发吧

translation.en: I'm ready.
translation.zh: 我准备好了

translation.en: Welcome to Brooklyn.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到布鲁克林

translation.en: [Pat Russo] What we do with the kids, it's quiet prevention.
translation.zh: 我们训练这些孩子主要是为了防患于未然

translation.en: If the kids are in the gym,
translation.zh: 如果这些孩子来拳击馆

translation.en: and they're off the streets and they're staying in school...
translation.zh: 他们离开街头 待在学校

translation.en: They'll all tell you that the program's changed their life.
translation.zh: 他们都会告诉你这里的训练改变了自己的人生

translation.en: It cost us about $50,000 to run one gym, to run one gym.
translation.zh: 经营一个拳击馆大约需要五万美元 （主管 帕特拉索中士）
只不过五万…五万美元意味着什么？

translation.en: It'll cost $67,000
translation.zh: 在这个城市里

translation.en: to put one kid in jail for a year in this city...
translation.zh: 让一个孩子在监狱里待一年需要六万七千美元

translation.en: which is insanity.
translation.zh: 这是很疯狂的事

translation.en: [coach] Come on, baby, come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 加油 孩子 继续

translation.en: These boxing gyms that created legends and boxing champions...
translation.zh: 那种能打造传奇和拳击冠军的拳击馆… （苏格雷伦纳德 拳击名人堂）

translation.en: seem to no longer exist.
translation.zh: …似乎已不复存在

translation.en: I find it quite disturbing because boxing has given me so much.
translation.zh: 我觉得很不安因为拳击给予了我很多东西

translation.en: It has given me such a life.
translation.zh: 它给了我如今的人生

translation.en: And if it wasn't for boxing, I'd, more than likely...
translation.zh: 若不是拳击 我更有可能

translation.en: I would be in jail or dead.
translation.zh: 我会进监狱或者死掉

translation.en: [Bulger] Sergeant Russo, Teddy Atlas, and the NYPD Boxing Team
translation.zh: 拉索中士 泰迪阿特拉斯和纽约市警察局拳击队

translation.en: understand that every kid kept off the street
translation.zh: 明白每从街头拉回一个孩子

translation.en: is a kid who doesn't end up in trouble.
translation.zh: 就少一个最后会陷入麻烦的孩子

translation.en: And so, when the Police Athletic League, the staple community boxing gyms,
translation.zh: 当警察运动联盟 主要是社区拳击馆

translation.en: shut down their programs,
translation.zh: 关闭了各自的项目时

translation.en: they started Atlas Cops and Kids,
translation.zh: 他们成立了阿特拉斯警察和小孩

translation.en: which has quickly become one of the most successful boxing programs in the country.
translation.zh: 这个俱乐部迅速成了全美最成功的拳击项目

translation.en: Thank God for a program like that.
translation.zh: 感谢那个项目

translation.en: It takes a lot of those kids off the streets.
translation.zh: 它让很多小孩远离了街头

translation.en: Within six years, we built eight national champions,
translation.zh: 六年内 我们就培养了八个全国冠军

translation.en: eight New York Golden Glove champions,
translation.zh: 八个纽约金手套拳击赛冠军

translation.en: and now we've got a couple of pros, you know.
translation.zh: 我们现在有了好几位职业拳击手

translation.en: [Colbert] I'm 116 fights. 113-3.
translation.zh: 我打了116场比赛 113胜3输 （非职业纪录赢-113 输-3）

translation.en: I'm a four-time national champion.
translation.zh: 我是四届全国冠军

translation.en: A Golden Glove champion, ranked number one in the country.
translation.zh: 一届金手套冠军 目前排名全美第一

translation.en: I'm not letting nobody beat me.
translation.zh: 我不会让任何人把我打败

translation.en: One day, I'ma turn pro.
translation.zh: 总有一天 我要做职业拳击手

translation.en: I'm destined to be world champion. I gotta be world champion.
translation.zh: 我注定要成为世界冠军 我一定会是

translation.en: Jab, jab!
translation.zh: 猛击！

translation.en: B-Hop absolutely can become champion of the world.
translation.zh: B霍普绝对会成为世界冠军

translation.en: He's got a gift, he does.
translation.zh: 他有天赋 真的

translation.en: He's got something special about him.
translation.zh: 他有很特别的天赋

translation.en: He has the potential, he has the talent.
translation.zh: 他有潜力 有才能

translation.en: But it's gonna be no cakewalk.
translation.zh: 不过冠军之路并非易事

translation.en: The name B-Hop, it came from the legend Bernard Hopkins.
translation.zh: B霍普这个名字来自伯纳德霍普金斯

translation.en: He was like me. He came off the streets, straight off the streets, winning.
translation.zh: 他跟我相似 也是来自街头从街头走上拳击台 一直赢

translation.en: He's the best, man. Just like me. You know how it is.
translation.zh: 他最厉害 老兄 就像我 你懂的

translation.en: Biologically, he's not my son.
translation.zh: 他不是我的亲生儿子 （伯纳德霍普金斯）

translation.en: Because people were like, "Wait a minute, you got a son in Brooklyn?"
translation.zh: （伯纳德霍普金斯） 有人问我“你在布鲁克林有个儿子？”

translation.en: He's my son, but not of... You know what I mean.
translation.zh: 他是我儿子 但不是…你明白我的意思

translation.en: Not of my son.
translation.zh: 不是我的亲生儿子

translation.en: [Sosa] Once he stepped in the ring and learned how to fight,
translation.zh: 他一走上拳击台 学会了拳击

translation.en: he never had a fight in the street.
translation.zh: 就再没有到街上去打过架

translation.en: Five, six years he never had a fight in the street. But before that,
translation.zh: 五六年了 他从来没去打过街架但在以前

translation.en: every other weekend, every other week, fight, fight, fight.
translation.zh: 每个周末 每个星期除了打架还是打架

translation.en: Now he's good.
translation.zh: 现在他很好

translation.en: [Colbert] Me and Sosa been rocking since day one. He changed my life. A lot, a lot.
translation.zh: 我和索萨从第一天起就很好他改变了我的人生 很大的改变

translation.en: He's like a father figure in my life.
translation.zh: 他在我的人生中是父亲的形象

translation.en: You see this?
translation.zh: 看到没？

translation.en: [Bulger] What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Sosa Crew For Life.
translation.zh: 终生的索萨团队

translation.en: You see it.
translation.zh: 你看到了

translation.en: [Bulger] Who made that?
translation.zh: 谁弄的？

translation.en: My dad.
translation.zh: 我爸

translation.en: It's a little rewarding, I mean, 'cause, you know, saying like... that I'm his dad.
translation.zh: 这算是个小小的奖励他说…说我是他爸爸

translation.en: I mean, it, um...
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: I'm making a difference, you know.
translation.zh: 我改变了某些东西

translation.en: Everything on you, so you gotta pay for me,
translation.zh: 一切都靠你了 你得为我祈祷

translation.en: -[chuckles] What? -Wayne...
translation.zh: -韦恩…-怎么了？

translation.en: ...my girl, and then I'ma pay you back.
translation.zh: …我女朋友 然后我会报答你

translation.en: Your girl? Your girl makes more money than me.
translation.zh: 你女朋友？你女朋友赚钱比我还多

translation.en: [Colbert] Nah, you crazy.
translation.zh: 没有 你疯啦

translation.en: [Sosa] Boxing got him off the streets,
translation.zh: 拳击让他远离了街头

translation.en: but I always tell him, "You got to be careful, man.
translation.zh: 但我一直告诉他“你一定要小心 哥们

translation.en: A lot of bad stuff happened in front of this building, you know, but...
translation.zh: 这栋楼前面发生过很多坏事

translation.en: They don't care if you fight or not.
translation.zh: 人家才不管你是不是打拳的

translation.en: Remember, a bullet is faster than your hands."
translation.zh: 记住 子弹可比你的拳头快多了”

translation.en: [Sosa] Yeah, that's how my day starts, man.
translation.zh: 对 我的一天就是这样开始的

translation.en: Get up at 5:30, get ready for work.
translation.zh: 5点半起床 准备上班

translation.en: Be at work by 7:00, 7:10. Start work at 8:00.
translation.zh: 7点或7点10分去上班8点钟开始上班

translation.en: We should be finished by 2:00.
translation.zh: 我们要在2点前结束工作

translation.en: And then, um, head out to the gyms.
translation.zh: 然后就去拳击馆

translation.en: [Bulger] Someone's living the Mexican-American dream.
translation.zh: 活在墨西哥裔美国人的梦想中

translation.en: I don't know if you wanna call it that, but let's say hard work pays off.
translation.zh: 不知道你会不会这样说但努力工作总会有回报

translation.en: I mean, unfortunately,
translation.zh: 不幸的是

translation.en: I didn't realize I was a coach until almost ten years ago, you know.
translation.zh: 十年前 我没意识到我会做教练

translation.en: I wasted a lot of my time just...
translation.zh: 我浪费了很多时间

translation.en: doing nothing. Just working, you know.
translation.zh: 却一事无成 一直在工作

translation.en: Twenty-six years of my life in this place.
translation.zh: 我在这个地方待了26年

translation.en: It is difficult to try to manage work and the kids.
translation.zh: 很难在工作和这些孩子之间平衡

translation.en: Yeah, I have, like, 30, 40 that compete.
translation.zh: 对 我有三四十个孩子要比赛

translation.en: And to train 30, 40 kids, it's hard.
translation.zh: 要训练三四十个拳击手 很难

translation.en: It's hard.
translation.zh: 很难

translation.en: And if I could do boxing 24/7, I would do this 24/7.
translation.zh: 我要是能每天24小时练拳那我会练24小时

translation.en: But at this time,
translation.zh: 但目前来说

translation.en: making $200 every two months, three months, can't do it, can't do it.
translation.zh: 我每两三个月才挣200美元没法做到

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: 知道吗？

translation.en: B-Hop, he's been getting better and better and better.
translation.zh: B霍普 他越来越厉害了

translation.en: And if B-Hop turns out the way we think he's gonna turn out...
translation.zh: 如果B霍普的发展方向和我们想的一样

translation.en: four years I think I'll be out.
translation.zh: 我想四年后我就能脱离困境

translation.en: -Time to get to work. -[indistinct chatter and laughter]
translation.zh: 该干活了

translation.en: [Colbert] I won my last amateur tournament.
translation.zh: 我赢了最后一次业余比赛

translation.en: So I was like, "Yeah, I'ma just go pro now. Time to go.
translation.zh: 所以我说：“对我要做职业拳击手 该去实现了

translation.en: Waste no more time."
translation.zh: 不能再浪费时间”

translation.en: He wanna go to the Olympics. I'm not pressing to go to the Olympics.
translation.zh: 他想去参加奥运会 我没有压力

translation.en: When I first started, I always wanted to be an Olympic coach.
translation.zh: 从一开始 我就想成为奥运会的教练

translation.en: Like, I want to be up there when...
translation.zh: 我想到赛场上去…

translation.en: At the Olympics, I want to be one of the head coaches of the United States.
translation.zh: 我想成为美国的主教练之一

translation.en: [Colbert] I don't care about the Olympics. I never...
translation.zh: 我不在乎奥运会

translation.en: Like, that never was really my mindset, to go to Olympics.
translation.zh: 我心里从没想过去奥运会

translation.en: My mindset was always to be world champion, to be rich, like Floyd Mayweather.
translation.zh: 我只想成为世界冠军成为富人 像弗洛伊德梅威瑟一样

translation.en: [Hopkins] Boxing and gold medal and being in Olympics
translation.zh: 拳击 金牌 参加奥运会

translation.en: is dead in America right now.
translation.zh: 这一切在美国都死了

translation.en: Fighters, they look at Floyd Mayweather, they look how much money he's making.
translation.zh: 拳击手都看着弗洛伊德梅威瑟他们只在乎他能赚多少钱

translation.en: [scoffs] "Why would I go in Olympics and get nothing,
translation.zh: “我为什么要去奥运会除了耐克的一点赞助

translation.en: but maybe some sponsorship from Nike?
translation.zh: 什么都得不到？

translation.en: And I can go right to the pros,
translation.zh: 我可以直接去做职业拳击手

translation.en: and buy me a Bugatti."
translation.zh: 然后给自己买辆布加迪”

translation.en: Think about it.
translation.zh: 想想吧

translation.en: [Bulger] The Olympics used to be where USA beat the crap out of the world,
translation.zh: （弗洛伊德“钱”梅威瑟） 美国曾经是奥运会上的不败之王… （乔治福尔曼）

translation.en: where we proved we were the best boxers.
translation.zh: …证明了我们是世界第一 （卡修斯克莱）

translation.en: Winning the gold medal, nothing surpasses that.
translation.zh: 赢得金牌是至高无上的荣誉

translation.en: There are people who can say, "I was a world champion professional boxer."
translation.zh: 有人可以说：“我是世界冠军职业拳击手”

translation.en: But to be an Olympic gold medal winner, very few people can say that.
translation.zh: 但赢得奥运金牌的人 很少能那么说

translation.en: It's the biggest prize that I've ever experienced.
translation.zh: 那是我得过的最高奖励

translation.en: [Bulger] But in 2012,
translation.zh: 但在2012年

translation.en: the US men's boxing team,
translation.zh: 美国男子拳击队

translation.en: the team that's won more than any other country...
translation.zh: 这支曾经赢过任何其他国家的队伍

translation.en: didn't win a single medal.
translation.zh: 一枚奖牌都没有赢得

translation.en: [announcer] The worst showing in history
translation.zh: 曾经赫赫有名的美国业余拳击队

translation.en: of the storied United States of America Amateur Boxing Program.
translation.zh: 打出了史上最差的成绩

translation.en: [Oscar De La Hoya] In today's era of fighters, winning the gold
translation.zh: 在今天拳击手的时代 赢得金牌

translation.en: and having the responsibility of representing your country...
translation.zh: 担负起代表祖国的责任… （奥斯卡德拉霍亚）

translation.en: it's not in their mind anymore.
translation.zh: …已经不是他们在乎的事

translation.en: The passion is gone.
translation.zh: 那种热情已不复存在

translation.en: [Bulger] So the question is,
translation.zh: 那么问题是

translation.en: who has the ability and the desire
translation.zh: 谁有那个能力和意愿

translation.en: to get USA men's boxing back on the podium?
translation.zh: 让美国男子拳击重新站上领奖台？

translation.en: The answer is a lot more complicated than you might think.
translation.zh: 答案远比你可能想到的复杂

translation.en: [Awesome] I started boxing in about 2005.
translation.zh: 我大约从2005年开始练拳击 （业余拳击手 卡姆F傲森）

translation.en: I was in 11th grade. 11th-12th grade, and I just did it for...
translation.zh: （业余拳击手 卡姆F傲森） 当时我上11年级或12年级我练拳击是为了…

translation.en: just to lose weight.
translation.zh: 只是为了减肥

translation.en: Then I started fighting, and I just kept winning and winning and winning.
translation.zh: 然后我就开始打比赛 而且一直赢

translation.en: And I was like, "Ah, maybe this isn't that hard."
translation.zh: 后来我说：“这事也许没那么难”

translation.en: Tyler, step in.
translation.zh: 泰勒 上去

translation.en: [Bulger] Cam F. Awesome is America's all-time winningest amateur boxer.
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森是美国业余拳击界的常胜将军

translation.en: And his trainer, John Brown, is the president of USA Boxing.
translation.zh: 他的教练约翰布朗是美国拳击联合会的主席

translation.en: [John] To box for America,
translation.zh: 为了代表美国去打拳

translation.en: you know, he gave up a lot,
translation.zh: 他放弃了很多东西…

translation.en: because, unfortunately, the way our system is,
translation.zh: （约翰布朗） …因为我们的系统

translation.en: we don't have much money for these guys.
translation.zh: 我们没有很多钱给这些拳击手

translation.en: So now he has to live on $1,000 a month that USOC gives him.
translation.zh: 所以现在他只能靠美国奥委会每月给他的一千美元过活

translation.en: And his fixed costs for his car,
translation.zh: 他每月的固定开支

translation.en: his rent and his utilities is $900.
translation.zh: 包括车子 房租和水电费总共是九百美元

translation.en: So that gives him $100 a month to live on.
translation.zh: 所以他每个月仅靠一百美元过活

translation.en: I mean, I help him,
translation.zh: 我会帮助他

translation.en: but he goes to the blood bank about once every two weeks and gives blood.
translation.zh: 但他每隔一两个星期就去血库卖血

translation.en: [Awesome] You do whatever you can for money. You pick up side jobs.
translation.zh: （打出成绩才算数！） 为了赚钱 你会做任何事会去做兼职

translation.en: You personal train people when you can, but it's pretty tough.
translation.zh: 你可以去做私人教练 但真的很难

translation.en: A lot of people don't understand why I haven't turned pro.
translation.zh: 很多人不明白我为什么不转为职业拳击手

translation.en: My mission, my goal, my ambitions, it's not the money.
translation.zh: 我的使命 我的目标 我的抱负不是钱

translation.en: I want that feeling of sitting next to two dudes from other countries
translation.zh: 我想要那种感觉 就是坐在两个来自其他国家的选手旁边

translation.en: who have to sit there and look happy
translation.zh: 他们必须坐在那 而且很高兴的样子

translation.en: while they play my national anthem and I get a gold medal.
translation.zh: 而这时奏起美国的国歌我获得一枚金牌

translation.en: That's what I'm chasing. That's the dream that I want.
translation.zh: 这就是我追求的 我想完成的梦想

translation.en: [Bulger] Cam should have had a shot at realizing his dream in 2012.
translation.zh: 本来2012年卡姆就有机会去实现梦想

translation.en: He qualified for the US Olympic Team, but then was suspended from competition
translation.zh: 他有资格进去美国的奥运代表队但他被禁赛了

translation.en: when he failed to make himself available for drug tests.
translation.zh: 因为他没能去参加兴奋剂检测

translation.en: I have to inform someone when I'm leaving town, and I didn't.
translation.zh: 我离开镇上时 应该通知别人但我没通知

translation.en: And that wasn't because I was doing any drugs or anything.
translation.zh: 我没有服用兴奋剂之类的

translation.en: It's just I had so much going on in my life.
translation.zh: 我当时做过很多事

translation.en: I was getting ready for the Olympics,
translation.zh: 我为奥运会备战

translation.en: I was traveling, leaving the country.
translation.zh: 去旅行 离开过美国

translation.en: Although I tested negative that same week that they were gonna drug test me,
translation.zh: 虽然他们要给我做检测的同一个星期我的检测结果是阴性

translation.en: I still needed to inform them, and I messed up.
translation.zh: 我还是必须通知他们结果被我耽误了

translation.en: During my suspension, I learned a lot about myself,
translation.zh: 被禁赛期间 我审视了自己

translation.en: I learned a lot about the people around me.
translation.zh: 和身边的人

translation.en: I decided to legally change my name
translation.zh: 我决定合法地改名

translation.en: and become a new person, new attitude, new way of life.
translation.zh: 重新做人用新的态度 新的生活方式

translation.en: February 16, 2013, Lenroy Cameron Thompson Jr. died,
translation.zh: 从2013年2月16号开始小林罗伊卡梅伦汤普森死了

translation.en: and then arose Cam F. Awesome.
translation.zh: 取而代之的是卡姆F傲森

translation.en: [Bulger] With his new name, Cam F. Awesome is giving the Olympics one last shot.
translation.zh: 用新的名字 卡姆F傲森是他为奥运会的最后一搏

translation.en: The road begins here, in Tennessee, at the first Olympic trials qualifier.
translation.zh: 他的路从田纳西州第一次奥运选拔赛资格赛开始 （第一天 美国奥运选拔赛资格赛）

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[man] Yeah, good work.
translation.zh: （第一天 美国奥运选拔赛资格赛） 漂亮

translation.en: -[grunting] -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: （距2016年奥运会还有606天）

translation.en: [man 1] Good job! [man 2] Cam, you da man!
translation.zh: -打得好！-卡姆 你厉害了！

translation.en: This guy is... To me, he box crazy...
translation.zh: 这个人…在我看来他打得很疯狂 但他赢了

translation.en: Crazy, but he wins.
translation.zh: （2012年奥运金牌获得者克劳瑞莎希尔兹）

translation.en: And everybody would be so mad and upset,
translation.zh: 大家都气急败坏

translation.en: but he's like, "Cam F. Awesome. What do you expect?"
translation.zh: 但他说“卡姆F傲森 你想怎样？”

translation.en: People are like, "What is he doing? That's ugly. That... What?"
translation.zh: 有人说：“他在干什么？好丑啊” （克里斯伯德）

translation.en: They don't understand that kind of style, but the boxers he's fighting...
translation.zh: 他们不懂那种风格但跟他对打的拳击手们

translation.en: -[grunts] -...they understand it.
translation.zh: 他们懂

translation.en: [announcer] Right, our winner, out of the blue corner, Cam Awesome.
translation.zh: 对 胜利者是蓝方的卡姆傲森

translation.en: [Bulger] Cam F. Awesome got his first win tonight.
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森今晚第一次赢了比赛

translation.en: He'll have to fight three more times over the next three days
translation.zh: 在接下来三天 他必须再打三场

translation.en: to earn a spot at the Olympic trials, a year from now, in Reno, Nevada.
translation.zh: 一年后在内华达州里诺才能获得资格参加选拔赛

translation.en: As if it wasn't difficult enough,
translation.zh: 好像不是那么难

translation.en: this road to the Olympics will be more dangerous than ever.
translation.zh: 但奥运之路比以往都更危险

translation.en: For the first time in 32 years,
translation.zh: 32年来第一次

translation.en: Olympic competition is taking place without headgear.
translation.zh: 奥运比赛将不戴头盔

translation.en: They want to give you the pro atmosphere... right?
translation.zh: 他们想给你职业拳击的氛围 对吗？

translation.en: But the amateur benefits.
translation.zh: 但受益的是业余拳击

translation.en: [Tom LeGan] We've been told that safety of the boxer is the primary concern.
translation.zh: 我们一直被告知首先要考虑拳击手的安全问题

translation.en: There is a bit of a conflict with the no headgear.
translation.zh: 不戴头盔有点冲突 （拳击教练 汤姆里甘）

translation.en: 'Cause, obviously, this wouldn't have happened without it.
translation.zh: 因为很明显没有头盔 就不可能比赛

translation.en: [Bulger] There are two clear distinctions between amateur and professional boxing.
translation.zh: 业余拳击和职业拳击有两个明显的区别

translation.en: Headgear and fighting for prize money.
translation.zh: 头盔和为奖金而比赛

translation.en: Now, AIBA, the famously corrupt International Boxing Association,
translation.zh: 以腐败著称的国际业余拳击协会AIBA

translation.en: wanna make the sport more entertaining.
translation.zh: 想让这项运动更好玩

translation.en: But here's the thing.
translation.zh: 但问题的关键是

translation.en: If one of these fighters gets a bad cut,
translation.zh: 只要有拳击手严重受伤

translation.en: even from something like an accidental head-butt,
translation.zh: 哪怕是因为意外的撞头而受伤

translation.en: they're out.
translation.zh: 那他们就出局了

translation.en: It's dangerous, and it's stupid.
translation.zh: 很危险 很愚蠢

translation.en: It's not setting you up for the pros, it's fucking you up for the pros.
translation.zh: 这不是帮你做职业拳击手纯粹是害人不浅

translation.en: You're losing a couple of brain cells before you even turn pro.
translation.zh: 还没成职业拳击手你的脑袋就完蛋了

translation.en: [De La Hoya] If I didn't have headgear, and I was getting cut,
translation.zh: 如果我不戴头盔 然后受伤了

translation.en: and beat up, and bruised up, and knocked out,
translation.zh: 被打了 擦伤了 晕厥了

translation.en: I would turn pro. I mean, might as well get paid for it.
translation.zh: 我就能成职业拳击手那倒不如给点报酬

translation.en: [John] You know, even pros don't fight five days in a row.
translation.zh: 即便是职业拳击手也不会连续打五天

translation.en: Maybe the best guy doesn't win all the time,
translation.zh: 最厉害的拳击手也不会只赢不输

translation.en: whoever's the luckiest wins. That doesn't get head-butted.
translation.zh: 最幸运的才能赢 他们不会被撞头

translation.en: A guy can't box five days in a row without headgear without getting banged up.
translation.zh: 不戴头盔的话没人能连续打五天而不受伤

translation.en: It's impossible.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: Cam F. Awesome,
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森

translation.en: he's the only male we've got that has a shot at winning the Olympics.
translation.zh: 他是唯一有机会在奥运会上赢的男选手

translation.en: Winning a medal at the Olympics.
translation.zh: 赢得奥运奖牌

translation.en: He's the guy.
translation.zh: 就是他

translation.en: And the problem is, the rest of the world is way ahead of us.
translation.zh: 问题是 其他国家走在我们前面

translation.en: You know, the rest of the world, amateur boxers make a living boxing.
translation.zh: 其他国家的业余拳击手可以靠拳击谋生

translation.en: Ours don't.
translation.zh: 我们的不行

translation.en: In 2016, you're gonna see the true amateur
translation.zh: 2016年你会看到美国培养的

translation.en: that we develop here in the United States
translation.zh: 真正的业余拳击手… （迈克马蒂诺）

translation.en: and we've done since the early 1900s for the Olympics,
translation.zh: …以及自20世纪早期开始我们为奥运会所做的一切

translation.en: you're gonna see them competing against pros.
translation.zh: 你会看到他们跟职业拳手较量

translation.en: And so, that's gonna be a big challenge for our athletes.
translation.zh: 这对我们的运动员来说会是很大的挑战

translation.en: [Mirko Wolf] We have the impression... Everyone in the world, we have the impression
translation.zh: 全世界的人都觉得

translation.en: that USA is the number one nation in everything.
translation.zh: 美国是世界第一强国 （米尔科沃尔夫国际拳击协会执行董事）

translation.en: -You are, like, the big brother. Yeah. -[Bulger] We have so many athletes.
translation.zh: （米尔科沃尔夫国际拳击协会执行董事） -你们就是大哥-我们有很多运动员

translation.en: Like, you take care of it. Like, you... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你们能搞定一切 -你们知道自己在做什么-对

translation.en: -You just know what you're doing. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你们知道自己在做什么-对

translation.en: And you come here, and you see the level of competition, and it's like...
translation.zh: 来到这 你们会看到比赛的水平…

translation.en: If you send those kids against Russia, man, it's gonna be sad for you.
translation.zh: 如果送这些孩子去跟俄罗斯较量那就悲剧了

translation.en: [Bulger] At the Rio Summer Games, our fighters will be competing with pros without headgear.
translation.zh: 在里约夏季奥运会上 我们的拳手将不戴头盔地跟职业拳手较量

translation.en: USA Boxing is awarded funding from the USOC based on their medal count.
translation.zh: 美国奥委会将根据奖牌数资助美国拳击联合会

translation.en: At this point, they can boycott the Olympics and protest,
translation.zh: 这种情况下他们可以抵制奥运 提出抗议

translation.en: or continue to send our amateur fighters and hope for the best.
translation.zh: 或者继续送我们的业余拳手去比赛抱着乐观的希望

translation.en: [Awesome] The good boxers have to turn pro because they need money.
translation.zh: 好的拳手必须转做职业拳手因为他们需要钱

translation.en: So, we won't get medals until we get funding.
translation.zh: 没有资金 我们就不能赢得奖牌

translation.en: -This is it. Ali's in the house, right? -Thank you.
translation.zh: 没错 阿里在场上 对吗？谢谢

translation.en: Yeah, we won't get funding until we get medals,
translation.zh: 赢不了奖牌 我们就得不到资金

translation.en: so we're chasing our tail.
translation.zh: 所以我们必须自己瞎忙活

translation.en: -If I can bring back home a medal... -[bell rings] ...I can change that.
translation.zh: 我要是能赢回一枚奖牌就能改变现状

translation.en: [man] There you go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[referee] Time!
translation.zh: 时间到！

translation.en: [John] Beautiful.
translation.zh: 漂亮

translation.en: -I think he's heartbroke already. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我觉得他已经心碎了-对

translation.en: Okay, let's keep that show going. I like that Ali shit.
translation.zh: 好 继续打吧我喜欢那招阿里的打法

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[indistinct chatter]
translation.zh: （第二回合）

translation.en: [John] A little Tyson going on.
translation.zh: 有小泰森的架势

translation.en: [man 1] Breathe! Breathe!
translation.zh: 呼吸！

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[John] That's enough.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: [man 1] Breathe! Breathe!
translation.zh: 呼吸！

translation.en: [John] Good call.
translation.zh: 打得好

translation.en: From the 201-plus pound weight division, by TKO,
translation.zh: 91公斤以上重量级拳击赛技术得胜

translation.en: Mr. Cam F. Awesome!
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森先生！

translation.en: [announcer] Great job, guys. Congratulations. Great job.
translation.zh: 不错 各位 恭喜 打得很好

translation.en: [Bulger] It's Cam's 12th national tournament championship,
translation.zh: 这是卡姆第12次获得全国锦标赛冠军

translation.en: and it qualifies him for the US Olympic trials, a year from now.
translation.zh: 这也让他获得了一年后美国奥运选拔赛的资格

translation.en: If he wins that, he'll go on to fight the best fighters in North and South America.
translation.zh: 如果赢了 他将继续跟北美和南美最出色的拳手较量

translation.en: And if he places in the top three, he'll earn a spot at the Olympic games.
translation.zh: 如果进入前三强他就能获得参加奥运会的资格

translation.en: All in hopes of becoming the super heavyweight gold medalist.
translation.zh: 我满心希望他赢得超重量级金牌

translation.en: [Awesome] All right. See you guys again... soon.
translation.zh: 好 回头见

translation.en: [Bulger] I grew up playing Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!!
translation.zh: 我从小就玩泰森的拳击游戏《拳无虚发》

translation.en: A game inspired by the baddest man on the planet.
translation.zh: 这个游戏的灵感来自地球上最厉害的拳击手

translation.en: One of the most famous athletes in the world.
translation.zh: 他也是全世界最伟大的运动员之一

translation.en: But as we began filming,
translation.zh: 但我们开始拍摄时

translation.en: we hadn't had an American heavyweight champion in over a decade.
translation.zh: 美国已经十多年没有赢得过重量级拳击冠军了

translation.en: People always say, "Steve, where are the great heavyweights?"
translation.zh: 大家都问杰出的重量级拳击手都去哪了？

translation.en: I said, "They're on the football gridiron, or they're posting up in the paint."
translation.zh: （拳击作家 史蒂夫金姆） 在橄榄球赛场上 要不就在篮球场上

translation.en: And there used to be a saying, years ago,
translation.zh: 多年前 有个说法

translation.en: "As the heavyweight division goes, so goes the game of boxing."
translation.zh: “重量级拳击没落了整个拳击运动也会随之没落”

translation.en: [Bulger] We're a long way from the Mike Tyson heavyweight-knockout era,
translation.zh: 我们跟迈克泰森重量级称霸

translation.en: and the popularity that came with it.
translation.zh: 和随之而来的热捧那个年代差远了

translation.en: But for the last decade,
translation.zh: 但在过去十年中

translation.en: Floyd "Money" Mayweather has been the face of boxing.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德“钱”梅威瑟成了拳击的代言人

translation.en: The master counterpuncher changed the game,
translation.zh: （TMT 钱队） 这位反击高手改变了这项运动

translation.en: as he mitigates risk and maximizes profits,
translation.zh: 他降低了风险 使利益最大化

translation.en: putting his undefeated record on the line when the money is right.
translation.zh: 冒着丢掉自己不败纪录的危险只要能赚到钱

translation.en: [Paulie Malignaggi] Times change. It's the Mayweather era now.
translation.zh: 今非昔比了 现在是梅威瑟时代

translation.en: It's not the Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! era, it's not the Ali era,
translation.zh: 已经不是迈克泰森《拳无虚发》或阿里称霸的时代… （保利马里格纳吉）

translation.en: it's not the Joe Louis era, the Rocky Marciano era.
translation.zh: …也不是乔路易斯或洛奇马西阿诺的时代

translation.en: Things change and the eras move on along.
translation.zh: 时过境迁了

translation.en: [Mike Woods] So Floyd Mayweather will tell you that he is the best ever.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德梅威瑟会告诉你他才是史上最强

translation.en: "I made more money than anyone else in all of sports."
translation.zh: “我赚的钱比任何运动员赚的都多”

translation.en: And I'll say to that, I don't really give a fuck.
translation.zh: 我会说 我一点都不稀罕

translation.en: I don't really give a shit. That doesn't make you TBE, The Best Ever.
translation.zh: 我一点都不羡慕赚钱多才不会让你成为史上最强

translation.en: So, is he the perfect athlete for this new age of narcissism?
translation.zh: 在这个自我陶醉的新时代里他是最完美的运动员吗？

translation.en: And if he is, is everyone gonna follow his lead,
translation.zh: 他要是的话 人人都会跟风

translation.en: be a boxing businessman and say, "I pick who I want to fight"?
translation.zh: 成为拳击商人然后说：“想跟谁打我就选谁”？

translation.en: These guys enter into this, remember,
translation.zh: 这些拳手站到这里 记住了

translation.en: to prove something to themselves and to everyone else.
translation.zh: 他们是要向自己和他人证明一些东西

translation.en: And that's their legacy, and what will his legacy be?
translation.zh: 那就是他们的遗产梅威瑟的遗产会是什么呢？

translation.en: [Bulger] With Mayweather's undefeated career coming to a close,
translation.zh: 随着梅威瑟的不败历史终结后

translation.en: who will take his place as the next American boxing superstar?
translation.zh: 谁会取代他成为下一代美国拳王？

translation.en: [announcer] All right, fans, here we go!
translation.zh: 好了 粉丝们 比赛马上开始！

translation.en: Twelve rounds of boxing for the WBO middleweight championship of the world.
translation.zh: WBO中量级世界冠军赛总12个回合

translation.en: Introducing Peter "Kid Chocolate" Quillin!
translation.zh: 我们有请彼得“巧克力小子”奎林！

translation.en: As a kid, I used to dream about the title.
translation.zh: 从小我就梦想得冠军

translation.en: Or big fights, or big money and stuff, you know.
translation.zh: 或者参加大赛 或赚大钱之类的

translation.en: I had a sense of hope...
translation.zh: 我抱着一个希望

translation.en: I was gonna be able to, like, see something better.
translation.zh: 我能看到更厉害的表现

translation.en: -Do you want this title? -I do.
translation.zh: -你想要冠军吗？-想

translation.en: -Do you want this title? -I want this title.
translation.zh: -你想要吗？-想要

translation.en: All right, show me you want this title.
translation.zh: 证明给我看你想要冠军

translation.en: [Sam Watson] Peter Quillin, Kid Chocolate,
translation.zh: 彼得奎林 巧克力小子

translation.en: is one of the hottest fighters in the business at this time.
translation.zh: 是当今最炙手可热的拳击手之一 （山姆沃特森 海蒙拳击）

translation.en: [Quillin] I did everything in my power to try to make this work.
translation.zh: 我在能力范围内想尽办法取得成功

translation.en: [announcer] Coming in left, and down goes N'Dam!
translation.zh: 往左边 击倒N达姆！

translation.en: I got to where I wanted to be.
translation.zh: 我达到了我希望达到的目标

translation.en: I set a goal for myself, being the champion.
translation.zh: 我为自己设立了一个目标那就是成为冠军

translation.en: [announcer] And the new WBO middleweight champion of the world,
translation.zh: 新一届WBO中量级世界冠军是

translation.en: Peter "Kid Chocolate" Quillin!
translation.zh: 彼得“巧克力小子”奎林！

translation.en: I want to thank Grand Rapids, Michigan, for making me a fighter,
translation.zh: 我要感谢密歇根州大急流城让我成为拳击手

translation.en: and New York City making me a man.
translation.zh: 还要感谢纽约市让我成为男子汉

translation.en: I hope, through this,
translation.zh: 我希望通过这次比赛

translation.en: I inspire people that hard work can get you anywhere in life.
translation.zh: 激励人们 努力会让你无所不及

translation.en: [Quillin] Balcony looks pretty good to me.
translation.zh: 我喜欢阳台

translation.en: -[whirring] -This is a property that I bought.
translation.zh: 这是我买的房子

translation.en: The house is shitty right now, but I own it.
translation.zh: 这栋房子现在还不成样子但是我的了

translation.en: And now, I'm inspired to own as many cribs as I can, if possible.
translation.zh: 现在我要努力买尽可能多的房子

translation.en: -I want a new door. -[Papi Yordan] Okay, man.
translation.zh: -我想装一扇新门-好的 哥们

translation.en: Yeah, let's get a new door.
translation.zh: 对 装一扇新门吧

translation.en: [Quillin] When I was younger, we grew up in a house that my dad owned,
translation.zh: 小时候 我们在我爸爸的一所房子里长大

translation.en: till having that house taken away from us when my dad did his time in prison.
translation.zh: 直到我爸爸进了监狱那所房子被夺走

translation.en: That's the way I grew.
translation.zh: 这就是我的成长历程

translation.en: I gotta give him money, I give my mom money,
translation.zh: （彼得父亲帕皮约尔丹） 我会给我爸爸 妈妈和弟弟钱

translation.en: my little brother get money.
translation.zh: 我会给我爸爸 妈妈和弟弟钱

translation.en: [Bulger] That's a lot of people to take care of.
translation.zh: 有很多人需要我照顾

translation.en: Yeah, that's what I'm saying,
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: but he think I take care of my friends more than I look out for them.
translation.zh: 但他觉得我更照顾朋友

translation.en: -Because I can't-- -[Yordan] I know--
translation.zh: -因为我无法…-我知道…

translation.en: Can you send an e-mail out for somebody? Can you send an e-mail?
translation.zh: 你能给别人发封邮件吗？发封邮件行吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Now, that's what I'm trying to say.
translation.zh: 我就是这个意思

translation.en: So he want me to do more for him,
translation.zh: 他想让我为他做更多

translation.en: but he don't know what he's not able to do.
translation.zh: 但他不知道他自己能做什么

translation.en: So, I just let him be my dad and get a little bit of bread.
translation.zh: 我还认他做爸爸 给他点钱

translation.en: If you want to help me flip the cribs,
translation.zh: 你要是想帮我翻修房子

translation.en: I want it done the way... I'm the boss, not him.
translation.zh: 那就按我说的做 我是老板 不是他

translation.en: -Yeah, pero-- -It's my house.
translation.zh: -好 但…-这是我的房子

translation.en: -Yeah, pero-- -But I'm the boss.
translation.zh: -好 但…-但我是老板

translation.en: [Quillin] I'm making life-changing money for myself to be able to secure, like, my family,
translation.zh: 我自己要赚够能改变人生的钱这样才能照顾家人

translation.en: jobs for people that helped me,
translation.zh: 为曾经帮助我的人找到工作

translation.en: trying to increase my capital by making sure that I won't retire broke.
translation.zh: 我要努力赚更多钱确保我退役时不会破产

translation.en: [Bulger] Peter "Kid Chocolate" Quillin grew up here in Grand Rapids, Michigan.
translation.zh: 彼得“巧克力小子”奎林在密歇根州大急流城长大

translation.en: Just two doors down from Floyd Mayweather's family.
translation.zh: 距离弗洛伊德梅威瑟家只隔了两户人家

translation.en: Currently, their street has a combined record
translation.zh: 目前 他们那条街合起来的纪录是

translation.en: of 78 wins and zero losses.
translation.zh: 赢了78次 没有败绩

translation.en: He never gave up. He could've turned out... another way.
translation.zh: 他从不放弃 他本来可以朝另一个方向发展 （彼得的母亲 黛布拉奎林）

translation.en: Peter was really a troublemaker.
translation.zh: 以前彼得真的是个捣蛋鬼

translation.en: I mean, he'd get suspended in school because he's always fighting.
translation.zh: 他总是因为打架被学校停学

translation.en: So, well, you know, I said, "He needs to be in the gym."
translation.zh: （金手套拳击馆） 我说：“他应该进拳击馆”

translation.en: 'Cause I used to get Peter's ass, too,
translation.zh: 因为我以前也经常打他

translation.en: so, I think I had a big part in that because,
translation.zh: 所以我对他的影响也比较大

translation.en: from him weaving and dodging and ducking from me and running, and I'm getting out of breath...
translation.zh: 为了躲我 他会迂回 闪避 躲闪会跑开 让我喘不过气…

translation.en: Man, that boy was something.
translation.zh: 老天 这孩子不得了

translation.en: [man] One, two, three.
translation.zh: 一 二 三

translation.en: [all] Kid Chocolate!
translation.zh: 巧克力小子！

translation.en: [Quillin] Who knows what the "C" in champ stands for?
translation.zh: （迪金森小学） 谁知道徽章上的“C”代表什么？

translation.en: [all] Confidence!
translation.zh: 自信！

translation.en: -What does the "H" stand for? -[all] Hard work!
translation.zh: -“H”代表什么？-努力！

translation.en: -What does the "A" stand for? -[all] Attitude!
translation.zh: -“A”代表什么？-态度！

translation.en: -What does the "M" stand for? -[all] Motivation.
translation.zh: -“M”代表什么？-动力

translation.en: Y'all don't sound motivated. What?
translation.zh: 你们好像动力不足 代表什么？

translation.en: [all loudly] Motivation!
translation.zh: 动力！

translation.en: -What does the "P" stand for? -[all] Patience!
translation.zh: -“P”代表什么？-耐心！

translation.en: Okay, you take those words, I promise you, you can very, very much be successful.
translation.zh: 记住这些词语 我保证你们一定会非常成功

translation.en: [Bulger] Against all odds, Kid Chocolate made it out of Grand Rapids,
translation.zh: 巧克力小子排除万难 走出大急流城

translation.en: reaching the pinnacle of the sport
translation.zh: 到达了拳击运动的巅峰

translation.en: as he won the middleweight championship of the world.
translation.zh: 他赢得了中量级世界冠军 （冠军 中量级 72公斤）

translation.en: -But then, he just gave it up. -[baby cooing]
translation.zh: 但赢了之后 他放弃了

translation.en: [Bulger] What happened to his belt? Why isn't he the champ anymore?
translation.zh: 他的金腰带怎么了？他为什么不再是冠军？

translation.en: -Do you know? -Who knows?
translation.zh: -你知道吗？-谁知道呢？

translation.en: Those things happen. Real fighters win, lose, lose their belts, get them back.
translation.zh: （拳击教练 汤米加拉格尔） 胜败乃兵家常事拳击手也是赢了输 输了又赢

translation.en: [Bulger] He's undefeated, though.
translation.zh: 不过 他没有被打败

translation.en: Then something must have happened. I think he, uh...
translation.zh: 肯定是发生了什么事 我觉得他…

translation.en: Let me think. I think he went to the monastery for a while.
translation.zh: 我想想 他去了修道院一段时间

translation.en: [man 1] Peter Quillin announced that he would be vacating his title.
translation.zh: 奎林宣布他要放弃冠军头衔

translation.en: I'm sure you guys heard.
translation.zh: 我想你们肯定听说了

translation.en: [man 2] Allegedly, he's gonna make $1.4 million,
translation.zh: 据说 他能得到140万奖金

translation.en: so I don't understand what his motives are.
translation.zh: 所以我不明白他的动机是什么

translation.en: [man 3] All right, Peter Quillin, a lot of people want questions answered.
translation.zh: 好的 彼得奎林很多人都想知道答案

translation.en: [Bulger] Kid Chocolate wasn't defeated, he wasn't injured.
translation.zh: 巧克力小子没有被打败 没有受伤

translation.en: His decision left the boxing world in a state of confusion.
translation.zh: 他的决定让整个拳击界一头雾水

translation.en: After all, wasn't becoming a champion what boxers dream about?
translation.zh: 毕竟 不做冠军的话拳击手还梦想什么呢？

translation.en: What could possibly compel someone
translation.zh: 是什么东西迫使一个人

translation.en: to give up their championship title they fought so hard for?
translation.zh: 放弃如此努力得来的冠军头衔呢？

translation.en: -I'd like to thank Al Haymon. -Thank you, Al Haymon.
translation.zh: -感谢 阿尔海蒙-谢谢你 阿尔海蒙

translation.en: -Al Haymon. -Al Haymon.
translation.zh: -阿尔海蒙-阿尔海蒙

translation.en: Al Haymon didn't want him to fight the fight, he didn't want him to fight my guy, Korobov.
translation.zh: 阿尔海蒙不想让他跟科罗博夫打

translation.en: So what he did was, he just paid the guy not to fight.
translation.zh: （拳击经纪人 卡梅伦邓金） 所以他给他钱 让他别打

translation.en: Literally paid him not to fight,
translation.zh: 就直接给他钱 让他别打

translation.en: and promised him another fight if he didn't fight this fight.
translation.zh: 并承诺如果他不打这一场就让他打另一场

translation.en: Paid him half a million dollars because he didn't want to take a chance on losing.
translation.zh: 付给他50万美金因为他不想冒打输的风险

translation.en: [Kim] Basically, he is like the puppet master.
translation.zh: 实际上 他就像个傀儡大师

translation.en: Think of The Wizard of Oz, he's that guy behind the curtains.
translation.zh: 联想一下《绿野仙踪》他就是幕后那个人

translation.en: And he's just pushing all the buttons and levers.
translation.zh: 他只是按各种按钮而已

translation.en: [Bulger] I've heard the name Al Haymon, but I've never seen him.
translation.zh: 我听说过阿尔海蒙 但从未见过他

translation.en: He's like the opposite of Don King.
translation.zh: 他跟唐金正好相反

translation.en: He doesn't do interviews. He's just lurking behind the scenes.
translation.zh: 他不接受访问 就潜伏在幕后

translation.en: And with unprecedented pay days, he's earned his fighters' loyalty.
translation.zh: 用史无前例的钱收买拳击手的忠诚

translation.en: [Quillin] When I had my son, my kid, Al Haymon said,
translation.zh: 我儿子出生时 阿尔海蒙说

translation.en: "If you wanna fight for this belt, we can make that happen.
translation.zh: “你如果想挣这条金腰带我们可以帮你如愿

translation.en: Or you can not fight for the belt and get what you said you want,
translation.zh: 或者你可以不去打比赛也能得到你想要的

translation.en: which is time with your family,
translation.zh: 那就是跟家人在一起的时间

translation.en: which, I would say, you don't get that time back."
translation.zh: 我会告诉你时光一去不复返”

translation.en: ♪ Are you cold? ♪
translation.zh: 冷吗？

translation.en: ♪ Are you cold? ♪
translation.zh: 冷吗？

translation.en: ♪ Are you cold? ♪
translation.zh: 冷吗？

translation.en: So I took some time off.
translation.zh: 所以我离开了一段时间

translation.en: If you wanna say that advice is bad for somebody,
translation.zh: 如果你想说这个建议很糟糕

translation.en: then people can say what they want,
translation.zh: 人都可以选择自己想要的

translation.en: but I feel like I made the right decision for me.
translation.zh: 但我觉得这对我来说是个正确的决定

translation.en: [Hopkins] He gave up the belt because he was told to.
translation.zh: 他放弃金腰带是因为有人让他这么做

translation.en: These guys ain't their own boss.
translation.zh: 这些拳击手不能自己说了算

translation.en: I made 20 defenses, so I don't believe in givin' up belts.
translation.zh: 我卫冕了有20次我不相信有人会放弃金腰带

translation.en: If you ask me "Would I give up my belt?", I will say "No."
translation.zh: 如果你问：“我会放弃金腰带吗？”我会说：“不会”

translation.en: I worked too hard, I sacrificed too much. That belt will still be with me.
translation.zh: 我那么努力 牺牲了那么多那条金腰带还会是我的

translation.en: [De La Hoya] The fighters are not fighting for the glory, for the honor,
translation.zh: 拳击手们不是为荣誉 敬意

translation.en: for the respect.
translation.zh: 和尊重而战 （前中量级冠军）

translation.en: It's all about the business.
translation.zh: 大家都追逐商业利益

translation.en: I mean, who in their right mind gives up a championship title
translation.zh: 哪个正常人会放弃冠军头衔

translation.en: because they don't wanna face the best in their division?
translation.zh: 就因为不想面对他那个级别的最强对手？

translation.en: That's just unheard of.
translation.zh: 这真是闻所未闻

translation.en: In my era, you just don't do that.
translation.zh: 在我那个时候 没人会这样做

translation.en: You see people shitting on Peter Quillin, saying,
translation.zh: 你会听到众人谴责彼得奎林

translation.en: [tsks] "He ain't a fuckin' warrior. He don't wanna fight the best."
translation.zh: “他算什么勇士他不想跟最强对手较量”

translation.en: And Peter Quillin can answer you and say,
translation.zh: 彼得奎林会回答说

translation.en: "I'm listening to my trusted advisor, Al Haymon.
translation.zh: “我听从我最信任的顾问阿尔海蒙的建议

translation.en: It's gonna be pretty good for me."
translation.zh: 这对我来说很好”

translation.en: [Gallagher] It's about money.
translation.zh: 是为了钱

translation.en: It's about making a living so you can take care of your family.
translation.zh: 是为了谋生 为了照顾家人

translation.en: -[Bulger] Fuck the glory? -Huh?
translation.zh: 荣誉算个屁？

translation.en: [Bulger] Fuck the glory?
translation.zh: 荣誉算个屁？

translation.en: Glory's bullshit.
translation.zh: 荣誉就是个屁

translation.en: You can go in your bathroom and have glory.
translation.zh: 你可以进厕所去找荣誉

translation.en: Close the door and tell everybody who you are.
translation.zh: 关上门 告诉所有人你是谁

translation.en: You think the easiest route to do, like, in life,
translation.zh: 你以为人生中最容易走的路

translation.en: like, between being a boxer and then going to college,
translation.zh: 做拳击手和上大学

translation.en: which one would you choose?
translation.zh: 你会选哪个？

translation.en: I mean, in boxing, if you turn pro, if you got the right people around you,
translation.zh: 在拳击界 如果你转为职业拳手身边又有得力的人相助

translation.en: you can turn... you can make money in a heartbeat, you know what I mean?
translation.zh: 那分分钟就能赚钱 懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: Peter Quillin is one of the luckiest, blessed, talented fighters we have.
translation.zh: 奎林是最幸运 最有福气最有才华的拳击手之一 （山姆沃特森 海蒙拳击）

translation.en: He listens to Al Haymon. They talk.
translation.zh: 他听阿尔海蒙的话 他们会商量

translation.en: They always make sense on what they're doing,
translation.zh: 他们总是会弄清楚要怎么打

translation.en: when they're gonna fight, who they're gonna fight.
translation.zh: 什么时候打 跟谁打 都是有道理的

translation.en: And that's great.
translation.zh: 这就很好

translation.en: [Bulger] Unlike other professional sports,
translation.zh: 不像其他职业运动

translation.en: boxing doesn't have a single controlling organization,
translation.zh: 拳击没有单独的监管机构

translation.en: which is exactly what Al Haymon is after with his Premier Boxing Champions league.
translation.zh: 这就是阿尔海蒙和他的超级拳击冠军联赛追求的

translation.en: With half a billion dollars of venture capital,
translation.zh: 融资五亿美元

translation.en: he has the sport back on prime time for the first time in over three decades.
translation.zh: 30多年来他首次让这项运动重返巅峰

translation.en: And he's signing a lot of the best fighters...
translation.zh: 他签了很多最优秀的拳手但很少跟竞赛承办者及其拳击手…

translation.en: but Haymon rarely does business with competing promoters
translation.zh: 他签了很多最优秀的拳手但很少跟竞赛承办者及其拳击手… （奥斯卡德拉霍亚伯纳德霍普金斯）

translation.en: and their fighters.
translation.zh: …做生意

translation.en: And in boxing, the best all too often don't fight the best.
translation.zh: 在拳击界 强者通常不跟强者较量

translation.en: [Dunkin] You know, there's a lot of money being thrown around.
translation.zh: 背后都是在玩钱

translation.en: Can you imagine half a million dollars to not fight my guy? To not fight!
translation.zh: 你能想象出五十万美金就是为了不跟我的拳手打吗？不打！

translation.en: [Quillin] I want to set myself up for life.
translation.zh: 我想安置好自己的生活

translation.en: So, I'm gonna go out there and train like I'm trying to win,
translation.zh: （巧克力小子队） 我要去训练要做出我努力想赢的样子

translation.en: like my life is dependent on it and my son's life's depending on it.
translation.zh: 要像是我和我儿子的人生都依靠这件事

translation.en: [kid] Atlas Cops and Kids, baby!
translation.zh: 阿特拉斯警察和小孩 宝贝！

translation.en: [Bulger] You shouldn't be surprised to hear
translation.zh: 听说利尔B霍普签了第一份

translation.en: when Lil B-Hop signs his first pro contract,
translation.zh: 职业拳击合约时 你不会感到惊讶

translation.en: it's with Al Haymon.
translation.zh: 他跟阿尔海蒙签了

translation.en: Signing with Al Haymon, ain't nothing better than that.
translation.zh: 跟阿尔海蒙签约最好不过

translation.en: [Bulger] Why is that?
translation.zh: 为什么呢？

translation.en: 'Cause there's nobody that's gonna get you to the top,
translation.zh: 除了阿尔 没人能助你走上巅峰

translation.en: where you need to be,
translation.zh: 而你必须最强

translation.en: and make the right money that you're supposed to be making, but Al.
translation.zh: 必须赚该赚的钱

translation.en: [Sosa] Congrats. Hard work pays off. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 恭喜你 努力总会有回报你懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: Gonna show this world that the new superstar is on his way.
translation.zh: 我会向世界证明新的超级巨星在路上了

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的 先生

translation.en: [Gary Stark Jr.] Al's the best in business.
translation.zh: 阿尔是这行最好的顾问

translation.en: He has the best fighters now.
translation.zh: 现在他签了最优秀的拳手

translation.en: If you fight with him, you fight in the best shows.
translation.zh: 他会让你去打最棒的比赛

translation.en: He's the man.
translation.zh: 他能做到

translation.en: [Sosa] Jay, you're getting a glimpse of the future, Jay.
translation.zh: 杰伊 你的未来指日可待 杰伊

translation.en: A glimpse of the future.
translation.zh: 未来指日可待

translation.en: The Sosa Crew be taking over soon.
translation.zh: 索萨团队很快就会接管

translation.en: [Colbert] In this sport people think it's all about the money.
translation.zh: 大家都以为拳击是为了钱

translation.en: I mean, the money's gonna come regardless.
translation.zh: 无论如何 钱是要赚

translation.en: Like, right now?
translation.zh: 比如现在？

translation.en: I'll fight for $100, if I had to.
translation.zh: 如果不得不赚钱为了100美元我也会打

translation.en: No problem.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: To build my record, build my résumé.
translation.zh: 为了累积我的纪录 增添我的履历

translation.en: Let a lot of people see who I am.
translation.zh: 让更多人看看我是谁

translation.en: I'm in this to make history.
translation.zh: 我是要创造历史的

translation.en: A guy like him is supposed to be right now in some institution.
translation.zh: 像他这样的家伙现在应该被关在某个地方

translation.en: Think about it.
translation.zh: 想想吧

translation.en: He had no good start to be successful.
translation.zh: 他走向成功的起点并不高

translation.en: You know what it is, right? I'ma tell you something.
translation.zh: 你明白的 对吗？ （彼得奎林）

translation.en: God gives grace to humble people. Remember that.
translation.zh: 上帝赐恩给谦卑的人记住这句话

translation.en: This is gonna be your spotlight right now.
translation.zh: 现在轮到你闪亮登场了

translation.en: When it's your time, it's your time.
translation.zh: 时候到了 该来的总会来

translation.en: I'll tell you how good he may be someday. His nickname is Lil B-Hop. -Chris Colbert. -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 总有一天我会证明他有多厉害小名利尔B霍普 克里斯科尔伯特

translation.en: [Woods] Al Haymon is spending money hand over fist, and it's great.
translation.zh: 阿尔海蒙大手笔地花钱 好极了

translation.en: The fighters are getting paid like drunken sailors wanna be paid.
translation.zh: 拳击手们像喝醉的水手得到重金

translation.en: But are the right fights being made?
translation.zh: 但这样的拳击赛合适吗？

translation.en: Are the fans happy?
translation.zh: 粉丝们高兴吗？

translation.en: They're the ones that have to congregate to lift this sport up.
translation.zh: 只有有粉丝捧场了这项运动才能起来

translation.en: [Sosa] If you wanna do things the right way,
translation.zh: 如果想把事情做对

translation.en: you always have to get the right opponents.
translation.zh: 就必须有合适的对手

translation.en: And the right opponents, sometimes, are not the best opponents.
translation.zh: 合适的对手有时并不是最佳对手

translation.en: You know what I mean? But that's how you build them up.
translation.zh: 知道吗？但他们就是这样塑造起来的

translation.en: [Marquis Pierce] It's the first time he's ever gonna go four rounds,
translation.zh: 这是他第一次要打四个回合

translation.en: and I don't think he's ready for this shit.
translation.zh: 我觉得他还没准备好 （马奎斯皮尔斯）

translation.en: He's not even fighting for the same cause that I'm fighting for.
translation.zh: 他现在打拳的原因跟我都不一样了

translation.en: You wanna be famous and some superstar athlete.
translation.zh: 你想成为著名的超级运动员

translation.en: I'm fighting for my life.
translation.zh: 我是为自己的人生而战

translation.en: I'm fighting to make sure food get put on my fucking table and shit.
translation.zh: 我是为了有饭吃而战

translation.en: As I'm standing there, he's up in my face, you know, trying to talk down to me.
translation.zh: 我站在这里他轻蔑地挑衅我

translation.en: He's like, "This is gonna be an easy win." And "I'm not worried about nothing."
translation.zh: 他说：“赢这场简直易如反掌我一点都不担心”

translation.en: Dude, you're 18 years old, bro. Your balls barely dropped, my man.
translation.zh: 哥们 你18岁了怎么还没到青春期 老天

translation.en: [Awesome] Professional boxing, it's all about perception.
translation.zh: 职业拳击 考验的是洞察力

translation.en: This pro boxer's 25-0.
translation.zh: 这个职业拳手打了25比0

translation.en: But if you look at the 25 fighters he fought, they're literally nobodies.
translation.zh: 跟他交手的25名拳手他们谁都不是

translation.en: They're guys with 1-7 records
translation.zh: 他们的纪录只是1-7

translation.en: and guys who've never boxed before, guys making their debut.
translation.zh: 他们以前从没打过拳击或者是首次上场

translation.en: And they build someone's record
translation.zh: 他们衬托了别人的成绩

translation.en: to make them look like a great, undefeated boxer.
translation.zh: 让这些人看上去像是厉害的 不败的拳手

translation.en: [announcer] 122.6!
[Dunkin] Yeah, undefeated is so important.
translation.zh: 对 不败很重要

translation.en: In boxing, the second you lose, everybody's off of you.
translation.zh: 在拳击界一旦你输了 就没人再关注你

translation.en: We've come to a world now where winning is all that matters.
translation.zh: 我们现在这个世界赢才是王道

translation.en: As long as there are fighters out there
translation.zh: （拳击推广者 凯西杜瓦） 一旦有拳击手

translation.en: who think that they need to have an undefeated record to be relevant...
translation.zh: 他们需要一份不败的纪录才有意义

translation.en: I think they're very misguided.
translation.zh: 我认为他们这是被严重误导了

translation.en: I contribute that to Mayweather.
translation.zh: 我促成了梅威瑟的成功

translation.en: That's the Mayweather effect,
translation.zh: 形成了梅威瑟效应

translation.en: thinking about business and thinking about the fight second.
translation.zh: 要考虑商业 考虑比赛

translation.en: [Bulger] After years of anticipation, negotiation and hype,
translation.zh: 经过几年的期待 谈判和兴奋…

translation.en: here in Las Vegas on the first Saturday of May,
translation.zh: （梅威瑟 帕奎奥） …五月份第一个周六在拉斯维加斯

translation.en: Floyd "Money" Mayweather remains undefeated.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德“钱”梅威瑟依然不败

translation.en: Earning an estimated $300 million in one night
translation.zh: 他一晚上估计就赚了三亿美元

translation.en: as he defeats Manny Pacquiao in the fight of the century.
translation.zh: 他在那场世纪之战中打败了帕奎奥 （赢-47 输-0）

translation.en: But I'm across town at a place I always dreamed of reaching.
translation.zh: （西门） 但我在城镇的另一端那是我梦想到达的地方

translation.en: The National Golden Gloves Championships.
translation.zh: 全美金手套冠军赛

translation.en: [Jim Beasley] Golden Gloves, which started clear back in the 1920s,
translation.zh: 金手套比赛始于20世纪20年代

translation.en: and throughout the history,
translation.zh: 到目前为止

translation.en: most everybody has been in the Golden Gloves.
translation.zh: 大多数人都亲临过金手套比赛现场

translation.en: And many of our successful champions like Sugar Ray Leonard
translation.zh: （吉姆比斯利） 我们最成功的一些冠军像舒格雷伦纳德

translation.en: or Evander Holyfield or Mike Tyson,
translation.zh: 埃万德霍利菲尔德或迈克泰森

translation.en: all those kind of people, Oscar De La Hoya, you can name 'em all,
translation.zh: 他们这些人 还有奥斯卡德拉霍亚只要你能叫得上名字

translation.en: they were Golden Glove champs.
translation.zh: 他们都曾经是金手套冠军

translation.en: And so this is the beginning for the next breed of champions.
translation.zh: 下一代冠军也会这样开始

translation.en: -Dig down in there! -[exclaims]
translation.zh: 坚持住！

translation.en: Aim to the body. Both sides, baby.
translation.zh: 瞄准身体 侧边 孩子

translation.en: [Leonard] Winning the Golden Gloves was huge.
translation.zh: 赢得金手套奖意义重大

translation.en: But then you win the National Golden Gloves?
translation.zh: 但你赢得全美金手套奖呢？

translation.en: [scoffs] Forget about it. It was everything.
translation.zh: （1973和1974全国冠军） 算了吧 那可是一切

translation.en: Ask any boxer.
translation.zh: 随便去问个拳手

translation.en: [Bulger] So what's the plan tonight, champ?
translation.zh: 今晚有何安排 冠军？

translation.en: Packing up shoes, socks, shorts, cup, shirt.
translation.zh: 收拾鞋袜 短裤 杯子 衬衫

translation.en: Headgear.
translation.zh: 头盔

translation.en: Mouthpiece, check. Got all the stuff.
translation.zh: 牙套 好 带上所有东西

translation.en: Tonight fighting a dude from, uh, South Carolina, I believe.
translation.zh: 今晚要跟一位来自南卡罗来纳州的拳手打

translation.en: Don't know who he is. Uh, don't know what he looks like.
translation.zh: 不知道是谁 不知道他是什么样子

translation.en: Uh, well, I'm sure he's a really nice guy, so...
translation.zh: 我想应该是个好人

translation.en: let's go break his dreams.
translation.zh: 所以我要去打破他的梦想

translation.en: [Bulger] The Golden Gloves is one of the few things
translation.zh: 金手套比赛是业余拳击界

translation.en: that has stayed constant in amateur boxing.
translation.zh: 少数保持不变的赛事之一

translation.en: It has nothing to do with the Olympics,
translation.zh: 它跟奥运会没关系

translation.en: but it is the most prestigious tournament in the country.
translation.zh: 但在美国是最负盛名的锦标赛

translation.en: [Awesome] Golden Glove National Tournament gets you no ranking points.
translation.zh: 金手套全美锦标赛 既不能让你得到排名又不是国际比赛 都没有

translation.en: It gets you no international competition. Gets you nothing.
translation.zh: 既不能让你得到排名又不是国际比赛 都没有

translation.en: But there's... It holds weight.
translation.zh: 但它在大众眼中仍然有分量

translation.en: It holds weight in the world with people. They like Golden Glove champions.
translation.zh: 但它在大众眼中仍然有分量 大家喜欢金手套冠军

translation.en: This tournament, it's a big deal.
translation.zh: 这个锦标赛是一场盛事

translation.en: I'm gonna be takin' it very seriously.
translation.zh: 我要认真对待

translation.en: I'm fighting every fight
translation.zh: 我要打好每一场比赛

translation.en: like it's the gold medal fight in the Olympics this week.
translation.zh: 就像本周奥运会的金牌争霸赛

translation.en: -[man 1] Go, baby! -[man 2] Go!
translation.zh: -加油 孩子！-加油！

translation.en: [man 1] Whoop his ass!
translation.zh: 打倒他！

translation.en: [man 2] There you go!
translation.zh: 打得好！

translation.en: -[Bulger] Coach, how did he do? -[John] Excellent.
translation.zh: -教练 他表现如何？-非常好

translation.en: Perfect first fight.
translation.zh: 第一场很完美

translation.en: For all these other monsters, I saw about seven monsters out there.
translation.zh: 在所有厉害的拳手中我看到七位最厉害

translation.en: They are getting bigger every goddamned year.
translation.zh: 每年他们都有长进

translation.en: What happened to real heavyweights like Joe Louis, 202 pounds,
translation.zh: 真正的重量级怎么了？像乔路易斯 91公斤

translation.en: Joe Frazier, 204, and "Big" George Foreman, 220?
translation.zh: 乔弗雷泽 92公斤“大块头”乔治福尔曼 99公斤
阿里 98公斤

translation.en: [announcer] We have a winner, boxing out of the blue corner...
translation.zh: 我们的胜利者是蓝方

translation.en: -[applause] -...Cam Awesome. Cam Awesome.
translation.zh: 卡姆傲森 （赢-316 输-26）

translation.en: -[Bulger] Yo, Awesome. -[Awesome] Yo, yo.
translation.zh: -唷 傲森-唷

translation.en: -[Bulger] How did that go? -[Awesome] It went pretty well.
translation.zh: -怎么样？-很顺利

translation.en: My plan was just to land some jabs,
translation.zh: 我的计划是频繁地打刺拳

translation.en: every so often throw an overhand left to land-- to get some respect.
translation.zh: 我的计划是频繁地打刺拳 来个左摆拳赢得些尊重

translation.en: I figured I can win the fight
translation.zh: 我发现我能赢这场

translation.en: with no real risk of exchanging punches with him.
translation.zh: 没有险胜的危险

translation.en: [woman] Good job, Cam.
translation.zh: 很棒 卡姆

translation.en: -Thank you. Thank you. -Good job. Good job. Good job.
translation.zh: -谢谢-很棒

translation.en: -Bye, guys. -Thank you, young lady.
translation.zh: -再见-谢谢你 女士

translation.en: We'll see you at the craps table.
translation.zh: 庆功宴上见

translation.en: [Bulger] One hundred and thirty-eight people eliminated on day one.
translation.zh: 第一天淘汰了138位选手

translation.en: But Cam F. Awesome advances,
translation.zh: 但卡姆F傲森晋级了

translation.en: needing three more victories
translation.zh: 还需要赢三场

translation.en: to earn his fourth National Golden Gloves Championship.
translation.zh: 他就能获得第四次金手套冠军

translation.en: And maybe even the Golden Boy award,
translation.zh: 或许还能赢得金童奖

translation.en: given to the best overall fighter in the tournament.
translation.zh: 这是这个锦标赛颁给最佳拳击手的奖项

translation.en: Weigh-ins. I think I'm over 200 pounds.
translation.zh: 赛前称重 我觉得我超过90公斤了

translation.en: [Bulger] For years, Cam F. Awesome has dominated the amateur super heavyweight division.
translation.zh: 多年来 卡姆F傲森一直称霸业余超重量级级别

translation.en: But here in Vegas, he's got competition.
translation.zh: 但在拉斯维加斯 他遇到对手了

translation.en: Darmani Rock, from North Philadelphia, is 19 years old,
translation.zh: 来自北费城的达玛尼洛克他今年19岁

translation.en: and he's also qualified for the Olympic trials.
translation.zh: 他也获得了参加奥运选拔赛的资格

translation.en: At 260 pounds, people are talking about him
translation.zh: 在117公斤级别里 大家都在热议他

translation.en: like he's the next great American heavyweight champion.
translation.zh: 好像他就是下一位美国重量级冠军

translation.en: How's he doing?
translation.zh: 他表现如何？

translation.en: He's got a nice little right uppercut.
translation.zh: 他刚打了个漂亮的右上钩拳

translation.en: Yeah, I'm moving to my right--
translation.zh: 对 我移动到右…

translation.en: I mean, fuck this. You gotta start to do more.
translation.zh: 这可不够 你得使出更多招

translation.en: [Awesome] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [John] So, everybody thinks they can beat Cam
translation.zh: 人人都以为他能打败卡姆

translation.en: 'cause he's a little awkward and different...
translation.zh: 因为他有点笨拙 有点不一样

translation.en: -[Bulger] Right. -And they don't see the traditional boxer.
translation.zh: 不是传统的拳击手

translation.en: So they think, "Oh, boy, I can probably beat him."
translation.zh: 所以大家觉得：“我能打败他”

translation.en: And then they find out it ain't what it looks like.
translation.zh: 然后他们会发现事实并非如此

translation.en: So, I think we're gonna... I suspect it's gonna be fun.
translation.zh: 所以我觉得我们得… （赢-318 输-26） 我觉得会很有意思

translation.en: [announcer] Cam Awesome. Cam Awesome. Kansas City.
translation.zh: 卡姆傲森

translation.en: [Bulger] Four days later, sure enough,
translation.zh: 四天后 可以肯定了

translation.en: Cam and Darmani find themselves in the championship battle
translation.zh: 卡姆和达玛尼要在冠军争夺战上

translation.en: to determine who is the best super heavyweight in the country.
translation.zh: 决出谁是全美最厉害的超重量级拳手

translation.en: I don't... I don't get sucked into all the hype of who I'm fighting.
translation.zh: 我才不理别人对我对手的大肆炒作

translation.en: I haven't lost a single round this tournament.
translation.zh: 这次锦标赛我一个回合都没输过

translation.en: I'm going for the Golden Boy.
translation.zh: 我要为金童奖而战

translation.en: [man] It's a pretty unique opportunity for both these young men.
translation.zh: 今天对这两个年轻人来说都是独一无二的机会

translation.en: When you have a multi-day tournament, so much can happen.
translation.zh: 那么多天的锦标赛 什么都可能发生

translation.en: You know, you can get an injury...
translation.zh: 可能受伤…

translation.en: They could've met in a draw, and they could've met in the preliminaries.
translation.zh: 他们可能在抽签和初赛上见过

translation.en: So, it's really great for the boxing fans, it's great for the storyline,
translation.zh: 这对拳击迷和媒体来说都很激动

translation.en: and it's only gonna elevate their fight game.
translation.zh: 他们的比赛要升级了

translation.en: [announcer] This will be our last bout.
translation.zh: 这将是最后一场较量

translation.en: Two warriors at 201 pounds plus.
translation.zh: 两位91公斤以上的勇士

translation.en: Boxing out of the red corner, Cam Awesome.
translation.zh: 红方是卡姆傲森

translation.en: -[bell rings] -Fight!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: [man] You can't do that with that jab...
translation.zh: 你不能用刺拳…

translation.en: Is he hurtin' you?
translation.zh: 他伤到你了吗？

translation.en: Then, fuck him. Get in there and fight with him.
translation.zh: 别管他 上去打他

translation.en: If he's not hurtin' you...
translation.zh: 他要是没伤到你…

translation.en: Do some feint, and then, boom, come in. You feint, boom, come in.
translation.zh: 来几招佯攻 然后直接上

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[referee] Fight!
translation.zh: 开始！

translation.en: [referee] No. No, no. Stop!
translation.zh: 不 停！

translation.en: Let's hear about the 2015 National Golden Gloves champion...
translation.zh: 下面宣布2015年全美金手套

translation.en: -at 201 pounds plus... -[applause]
translation.zh: 91公斤以上级别冠军

translation.en: ...he happens to be boxing out of the blue corner.
translation.zh: 他是蓝方选手 （卡姆F傲森赢-318 输-27）

translation.en: -[cheering] -Darmani Rock.
translation.zh: 达玛尼洛克

translation.en: Darmani Rock.
translation.zh: 达玛尼洛克

translation.en: [Awesome] I regret walking out of the ring like that, but...
translation.zh: 我后悔就那样走下拳击台

translation.en: I fuckin' wanted the Golden Boy award.
translation.zh: 但我他妈真想要金童奖

translation.en: God, I never fuckin' get it.
translation.zh: 老天 我他妈居然没得

translation.en: I've fought... I've won fuckin' 12 national championships
translation.zh: 我为这个该死的国家打了12场

translation.en: for this goddamn country,
translation.zh: 全国冠军赛 场场都赢

translation.en: and not once have they given me fighter of the tournament.
translation.zh: 他们却不肯把锦标赛的冠军给我

translation.en: Statistically, I'm supposed to get it one out of every ten times.
translation.zh: 按照统计数据我应该有十分之一次机会

translation.en: I fuckin' won it 12.
translation.zh: 我他妈赢了12次

translation.en: This is my sixth time in the Golden Glove finals...
translation.zh: 这是我第六次参加金手套决赛

translation.en: and, uh, six times I fought in the Golden Glove finals and uh...
translation.zh: 这是我第六次参加金手套决赛 这是我第六次打金手套决赛

translation.en: ...and I'm going 50-for-50. That's disgusting.
translation.zh: 我有一半的机会 很恶心

translation.en: Fuckin'...
translation.zh: 真他妈…

translation.en: -[man laughing] -[Colbert] I already see it in my head.
translation.zh: 我已经想到了

translation.en: First round, I'm just gonna let him chase me.
translation.zh: 第一轮 我就让他追我

translation.en: Second round, B-Hop.
translation.zh: 第二轮 B霍普

translation.en: I'm gonna just start fuckin' him up, taking it to him.
translation.zh: 我会让他吃不了兜着走

translation.en: Every time I hit him, "Got him!" I'ma tell him that. "Got him!"
translation.zh: 我每次打他“打他！”我会喊出来给他听

translation.en: I'm gonna be like, "Lil bitch." I'm gonna be fuckin' him up.
translation.zh: 我会说：“利尔混蛋”我会让他吃不消

translation.en: And after the fight, after I knock his ass out,
translation.zh: 打完这场 把他击倒后

translation.en: stomp him, or beat the shit out of him, either one...
translation.zh: 要么踩他 要么打他

translation.en: I'ma be like, "Good shit, bro. I'm proud of you."
translation.zh: 我会说“好样的 哥们 为你骄傲”

translation.en: [laughs] So, you took that...
translation.zh: 这么说 你要面对…

translation.en: -Yeah, after-- -"Took that loss like a champ, bro."
translation.zh: -对…-“以冠军的姿态面对失败”

translation.en: After the fight, it's all love.
translation.zh: 打完后 全都是爱

translation.en: I ain't got no hate on him. I don't hate him.
translation.zh: 我不会恨他

translation.en: [Colbert] He just gotta get ass-whooped.
translation.zh: 他会被暴打

translation.en: I don't know why he signed that contract like a dickhead.
translation.zh: 不知道他为什么签了那份合约

translation.en: [barber] "Don't take it personal. It's business, bruh. Sorry.
translation.zh: 对事不对人 这是生意 抱歉

translation.en: Hope you're a fan after."
translation.zh: 希望你也变粉丝

translation.en: -[barber] See you later. -[Colbert] See you tomorrow.
translation.zh: -回见-明儿见

translation.en: Be good, man. Good luck, bro.
translation.zh: 保重 祝你好运 哥们

translation.en: -You're leaving? -See you tomorrow, man.
translation.zh: -你要走了？-明儿见 哥们

translation.en: -[Colbert] I look good. -[man 1] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我看起来真不错-是啊

translation.en: Greatest thing you can do is get that diploma, okay?
translation.zh: 最好的事是你拿到文凭 好吗？

translation.en: I am. I'm trying to. I'm not tryin', I'm gonna get it. But...
translation.zh: 我在尝试了 不是尝试 我会拿到的 （多萝西娅佩里）

translation.en: People keep stressing me about school, school, school, school, school.
translation.zh: 大家都用学校来压我

translation.en: I'ma stop going.
translation.zh: 我不去上学了

translation.en: -You're not gonna stop. -Who? Me?
translation.zh: -你不可以不去-谁？我？

translation.en: -I done stopped going before. -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 我早就不去了

translation.en: I done stopped going before, and then I just went back.
translation.zh: 我早就不去了 然后又去

translation.en: Don't do that. It'll just...
translation.zh: 别这样

translation.en: make you have to keep starting over. Bang it out.
translation.zh: 你必须重新开始赶快完成学业

translation.en: Soon I'ma get tired of it and not go back.
translation.zh: 很快我就会烦了 又不去了

translation.en: Just bang it out. Get rid of it. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 快点毕业 就不用去了懂我的意思吗？

translation.en: And you'll never have to go back again. -[chuckles] -Never.
translation.zh: -然后就永远不用回去了-永远不

translation.en: And then you'll start thinking about college, right?
translation.zh: 然后你就可以开始考虑上大学

translation.en: You can hear me?
translation.zh: 听到没有？

translation.en: -Right? -Huh? Say that again?
translation.zh: -对吗？-再说一遍？

translation.en: Then you'll start thinking about college, right?
translation.zh: 然后你就可以开始考虑上大学

translation.en: -[laughing loudly] -What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: College is easier than high school.
translation.zh: 大学比高中容易

translation.en: -[man] He's a fighter. Look at you. -I'm ready, man.
translation.zh: -他是个拳击手 瞧瞧你-我准备好了 哥们

translation.en: I ain't even worried. I just wanna get this shit over with.
translation.zh: 我不担心 我想我能克服

translation.en: [man] Let's go! Let's go! Let's go! Let's walk, guys!
translation.zh: 打起来！走起来 各位！

translation.en: Showtime! Come on, let's go!
translation.zh: 上场了！快点 走吧！

translation.en: Camera guys, you're holding me up. Let's go!
translation.zh: 摄影师 你们快点儿 走吧！

translation.en: -E and G, move! -[man] Showtime!
translation.zh: -摄影机E和G 开拍！-上场了！

translation.en: [Hopkins] Everybody believes he's talented.
translation.zh: 人人都认为他有天赋

translation.en: Only thing that's stopping him is his age and the fights.
translation.zh: 唯一阻碍他的是他的年龄和比赛经验

translation.en: And that's something that comes with time.
translation.zh: 这些是要随着时间增长的

translation.en: There you go! Jab again! Jab again!
translation.zh: 加油！再出刺拳！

translation.en: [Sosa] Let's get a little more... a little more physical.
translation.zh: 我们多活动一些

translation.en: Let's make this physical. Come on.
translation.zh: 动起来 来吧

translation.en: -Let's make this shit happen. -[bell rings]
translation.zh: 这回我们一定赢 （第二回合）

translation.en: [Malignaggi] You win in impressive fashion, the bums will be less bums.
translation.zh: 你赢得很精彩 菜鸟的水平会提高

translation.en: Maybe they'll go from two tomato can level to one tomato can level to,
translation.zh: 他们也会慢慢地

translation.en: you know, half journeyman level.
translation.zh: 熟能生巧

translation.en: The motivation is to mow through these guys,
translation.zh: 动力就是超过这些人

translation.en: dismantle them in every way possible,
translation.zh: 用尽一切办法摧毁他们

translation.en: so that people step you up the ladder
translation.zh: 有人会在你上面踩你

translation.en: until you reach the guys you have your eye on.
translation.zh: 除非你赶超那些目标

translation.en: [Colbert] It feels good to be a pro now.
translation.zh: 现在做职业拳手 我感觉挺好

translation.en: I always knew that I was gonna be something great in my life.
translation.zh: 我知道我会打出成绩 （职业纪录 赢-1 输-0）

translation.en: If it was either football, basketball, it don't matter what it was,
translation.zh: 不管是橄榄球还是篮球

translation.en: I always knew I was gonna do something great.
translation.zh: 我一直知道我能打出成绩

translation.en: [Elie Seckbach] Lil B looked phenomenal down in the ring.
translation.zh: 利尔B在拳击台上俯瞰全场

translation.en: His pro debut, no jitters.
translation.zh: 他的职业首秀 丝毫不紧张

translation.en: The haircut took longer than the fight.
translation.zh: 理发的时间都比这一场长

translation.en: It's gonna sound crazy, what I'm about to say,
translation.zh: 我要说的话可能很疯狂

translation.en: but he reminds me of Floyd Mayweather.
translation.zh: 他让我想起了梅威瑟 （拳击评论员 埃利瑟克巴赫）

translation.en: He reminds me of Floyd. A young Floyd Mayweather.
translation.zh: 他让我想起了弗洛伊德年轻时的弗洛伊德梅威瑟

translation.en: [man] One, baby, one.
translation.zh: 第一 亲爱的

translation.en: [Colbert] In the beginning of your career,
translation.zh: 职业生涯刚开始时

translation.en: you always have that little hill you've gotta get over.
translation.zh: 总是有座山要翻越

translation.en: I didn't get over that hill yet. I'm still standing on top of it.
translation.zh: 我还没越过去 我还站在山顶上

translation.en: I feel like I'm the man.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己能行

translation.en: And when it's time to really step things up,
translation.zh: 等时机成熟 一切准备就绪

translation.en: that's what's gonna happen, I'm gonna go over that hill,
translation.zh: 我就能翻越那座山

translation.en: and do what I gotta do, climb the next mountain.
translation.zh: 做我该做的事 爬下一座山

translation.en: Four more years, I'll be champion of the world.
translation.zh: 再过四年 我会成为世界冠军

translation.en: And that's a promise.
translation.zh: 这是一个承诺

translation.en: Yeah. Four more years.
translation.zh: 对 再过四年

translation.en: [Quillin] What they say about a fighter when he's, like,
translation.zh: 他们怎么说拳击手的…

translation.en: he got all the talent but he ain't in shape?
translation.zh: 他完全有天赋 但还不成熟？

translation.en: [trainer] He's a lazy motherfucker.
translation.zh: 他是个懒鬼

translation.en: [Quillin] And they say hard work...
translation.zh: 有人说努力…

translation.en: -Hard work always beats talent-- -Yep.
translation.zh: -努力能打败天赋…-对

translation.en: Talent can only take you so far.
translation.zh: 天赋只能让你走到这

translation.en: -What if you talented-- -Get that hard work in. Huh?
translation.zh: -要是他既有天赋…-又肯努力？

translation.en: What if you talented and you... hard-working?
translation.zh: 要是你既有天赋又…

translation.en: You're destined for greatness.
translation.zh: 那你注定会不朽

translation.en: [Bulger] After a year of inactivity,
translation.zh: （决不放弃） 沉寂一年后

translation.en: Al Haymon is putting Kid Chocolate back in the ring
translation.zh: 阿尔海蒙让巧克力小子重返拳击台

translation.en: against Andy Lee, an Irish fighter,
translation.zh: 对抗爱尔兰拳击手安迪李

translation.en: who just so happens to have won that same WBO Middleweight Championship belt
translation.zh: 他碰巧赢得了WBO中量级金腰带

translation.en: that Kid Chocolate gave up.
translation.zh: 也就是巧克力小子放弃的冠军

translation.en: [Quillin] I took a year off.
translation.zh: 我离开了一年

translation.en: People would've never thought I could fight for a belt
translation.zh: 大家都以为我放弃了上一条金腰带

translation.en: right away in my next fight after giving in, vacating the same belt.
translation.zh: 不会马上加入比赛

translation.en: And now I get to go in there as a challenger
translation.zh: 现在我必须作为挑战者上场

translation.en: for even more money for the same belt.
translation.zh: 去争夺奖金更多的同一条金腰带

translation.en: [Hopkins] Al Haymon is happy. He showed loyalty by giving the belt up.
translation.zh: 阿尔海蒙很开心他上次放弃金腰带表了忠心

translation.en: Al Haymon gets him the next fight, close to the same amount of money...
translation.zh: 阿尔会让他参加下一届比赛奖金数额也差不多…

translation.en: He promised him, he had to fulfill the promise, or whatever it is. Bam!
translation.zh: 他向他承诺过 必须履行承诺差不多是这样吧

translation.en: You're back to square one.
translation.zh: 你这次是重头再来

translation.en: [Bulger] So, what is the significance of these belts?
translation.zh: 金腰带有什么意义？

translation.en: And do they still define a champion?
translation.zh: 金腰带还是意味着冠军吗？

translation.en: In boxing's heyday, there were only eight weight classes,
translation.zh: 在拳击的鼎盛时期只有八个重量级别

translation.en: each with one undisputed champion.
translation.zh: 每个级别有一位无可争辩的冠军

translation.en: But then came the sanctioning bodies,
translation.zh: 但后来出现了监管机构

translation.en: organizations that created their own championship belts
translation.zh: 这些组织会打造各自的冠军腰带

translation.en: and received sanctioning fees from the fighters wearing them.
translation.zh: 向腰带得主收取监管费

translation.en: Now there are 17 weight classes,
translation.zh: 现在有17个重量级本

translation.en: each with an upwards of four different champions.
translation.zh: 每个级别最多有四个不同的冠军
