translation.en: The values of all those belts have dwindled,
translation.zh: 腰带的价值已经不如从前

translation.en: making an undefeated record, that purest proof of dominance,
translation.zh: 打下不败的纪录这才是纯粹的称霸证据

translation.en: more important than ever.
translation.zh: 这比任何东西都重要

translation.en: Jab-uppercut.
translation.zh: 上勾拳

translation.en: Yeah, but throw that uppercut. Throw it. Throw it right here.
translation.zh: 对 要用上钩拳 出拳 朝这里出拳

translation.en: It don't matter if you land it or not.
translation.zh: 打中打不中不重要

translation.en: The thing is to make him react to it, okay?
translation.zh: 关键是要让他有反应 好吗？

translation.en: [Eric Brown] The belt doesn't make the fighter. The fighter makes the belt.
translation.zh: 金腰带成就不了拳击手是拳击手成就金腰带

translation.en: He'll have more belts as time goes on.
translation.zh: （彼得教练埃里克布朗） 随着时间推移 他会赢得更多金腰带我们4月11号要赢一条金腰带

translation.en: We're gonna get a belt on April 11.
translation.zh: 随着时间推移 他会赢得更多金腰带我们4月11号要赢一条金腰带

translation.en: Once we get that belt, we'll get a couple more belts.
translation.zh: 一旦赢了 后面会赢更多

translation.en: [Debra] He's got a strategy of weaving.
translation.zh: 他很懂迂回战术

translation.en: You know, he will move around, and dodge, and come in, and squeeze out of there,
translation.zh: 他会左闪右避 出击 然后挤出来

translation.en: and move back and forth...
translation.zh: 来回移动…

translation.en: [Eric] That's it.
translation.zh: 对了

translation.en: [Debra] He's gonna do what he's gotta do.
translation.zh: 该做的他都会做

translation.en: He's gonna come out courageous.
translation.zh: 他会拿出胆量

translation.en: He's still gonna be what he is, and he's gonna be the champion.
translation.zh: 他还会是他 他还会是冠军

translation.en: And he's gonna get his belt back.
translation.zh: 他会把金腰带赢回来

translation.en: [Peter Berg] Peter Quillin had a reputation of being just one of the meanest men in the ring.
translation.zh: 彼得奎林在拳台上有最灵巧的拳手之称

translation.en: Now he's on the cusp of real greatness
translation.zh: 现在他离伟大仅有一步之遥… （彼得柏格）

translation.en: but he hasn't really hit it yet.
translation.zh: …但他还没有大获全胜

translation.en: And the only person that can change that,
translation.zh: 唯一能改变这种局面的

translation.en: and the only person that can fix that is Peter Quillin.
translation.zh: 唯一能扳回那种局面的只有彼得奎林

translation.en: [Quillin] I did some sprints on the beach today.
translation.zh: 我今天在海滩上练了短跑

translation.en: Ain't gonna hear no complaints about that. [Eric] I understand.
translation.zh: -不要抱怨-我明白

translation.en: -But I'ma remind you of my rule. -Okay.
translation.zh: -但我再给你说说我的经验-好

translation.en: [Eric] On sparring days, what do we do?
translation.zh: 拳击比赛时 我们该怎么做？

translation.en: We put it all over here.
translation.zh: 我们全力以赴

translation.en: [Eric] So, we run afterwards.
translation.zh: 然后就是跑

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, but--
translation.zh: 对 但是…

translation.en: -[Eric] Not before. -I don't have the time.
translation.zh: -不要像以前那样-我没时间了

translation.en: -[Eric] No, I understand, but... -So I have to work through it.
translation.zh: -我明白-必须设法打赢

translation.en: [Eric] I can't let you limp. I need your leg, okay?
translation.zh: 我不能让你瘸了你的腿还有用 好吗？

translation.en: Last time that's what I was doing.
translation.zh: 我会保住腿

translation.en: -[Eric] Yeah? -Yeah. So, I'm okay doing that.
translation.zh: -好吗？-好 我能行的

translation.en: Just, like, you got to hit that wall and this is when I do.
translation.zh: 你必须克服疲惫这时候必须这样

translation.en: -I did eight rounds all day. -Knock that motherfucker down.
translation.zh: -我今天打了八个回合-把他们全打败了

translation.en: -Today. -[man] Hiciste bien, hiciste bien.
translation.zh: -今天-非常好

translation.en: [Eric] Knock that motherfucker down.
translation.zh: 把那个混蛋打败

translation.en: [Leonard] With one year of inactivity,
translation.zh: 沉寂一年后

translation.en: it's extremely difficult being who you were...
translation.zh: 很难再回到以前的状态

translation.en: because you become civilized.
translation.zh: 因为你会变得中规中矩

translation.en: It's hard to come back to work.
translation.zh: 很难再回到工作状态

translation.en: And there are no shortcuts.
translation.zh: 没有捷径可走

translation.en: Boxing is beyond work.
translation.zh: 拳击不只是工作

translation.en: It's war.
translation.zh: 它是战斗

translation.en: Damn.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: I felt it.
translation.zh: 我感觉到了

translation.en: I think that was bad luck letting y'all film today, motherfuckers.
translation.zh: 让你们今天拍摄真是倒霉

translation.en: [Bulger] No, you did great.
translation.zh: 不会啊 你很棒

translation.en: "I did great." You hearing me?
translation.zh: “我很棒” 你听我说话了吗？

translation.en: Look, I got a busted lip. I feel... I don't feel good.
translation.zh: 看吧 嘴唇都青了 感觉不好

translation.en: [Bulger] You were tired already when you came in. You had a long day, right?
translation.zh: 你进来时已经太累了 今天比较艰难

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: I mean, every other day was a long day.
translation.zh: 每隔一天都很艰难

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, stepping to the scales,
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 请看读数

translation.en: Peter "Kid Chocolate" Quillin.
translation.zh: 彼得“巧克力小子”奎林

translation.en: One-sixty-one-point-four,
161.4 pounds for Peter "Kid Chocolate" Quillin.
translation.zh: 73.2公斤 这是彼得“巧克力小子”奎林的体重

translation.en: Peter Quillin will have two hours to lose 1.4 pounds.
translation.zh: 彼得奎林将有两个小时减掉0.63公斤

translation.en: There's a title fight tomorrow night, trying to get to a weight of 160.
translation.zh: 明晚有一场冠军争夺战必须减到72.57公斤

translation.en: The kids I had used to take 10 to 12 pounds off in two days.
translation.zh: 我以前带的孩子经常在两天内减掉4.53到5.44公斤

translation.en: What the fuck is two pounds? What are we talking about?
translation.zh: 0.9公斤是什么鬼？我们在说些什么？

translation.en: [Malignaggi] I think when you accept the fight, you have to make the weight.
translation.zh: 我想既然接受了比赛体重就必须达标

translation.en: You get a little bit civilized
translation.zh: 坐到钱堆里享受生活后

translation.en: as you sit back on your money and enjoy life,
translation.zh: 你有点太中规中矩了

translation.en: and, suddenly, the months pass and you haven't fought.
translation.zh: 几个月过去了 你一直没有打过比赛

translation.en: But if a belt was that important,
translation.zh: 但如果金腰带有那么重要

translation.en: you probably would've made the weight no matter how much you suffered.
translation.zh: 无论多痛苦 你都会让体重达标

translation.en: [Bulger] It's one of boxing's craziest rituals.
translation.zh: 这是拳击最疯狂的传统之一

translation.en: Fighters virtually starve themselves and sweat out pounds
translation.zh: 为了减重 拳击手几乎都会饿自己 然后流汗

translation.en: to make weight the day before a fight.
translation.zh: 在赛前让体重达标

translation.en: Kid Chocolate gets down to 160.5 pounds,
translation.zh: 巧克力小子减到了72.8公斤

translation.en: failing to make the 160-pound middleweight limit.
translation.zh: 还是没达到中量级72.57公斤的要求

translation.en: According to any of the belt rules,
translation.zh: 根据金腰带的规则

translation.en: you have to make weight in order to fight for the belt.
translation.zh: 体重必须达标 才能争夺金腰带

translation.en: You can't be one ounce, one quarter of an ounce over.
translation.zh: （布拉德博斯） 几克都不能超过

translation.en: You have to on weight or under.
translation.zh: 必须达到要求的体重或更轻

translation.en: So, this fight now went from being a title fight
translation.zh: 所以现在比赛从冠军争夺战

translation.en: to being a non-title bout.
translation.zh: 变成了非冠军战

translation.en: They don't take the Super Bowl trophy as a joke.
translation.zh: 没人会拿超级碗冠军开玩笑

translation.en: They don't take the NBA trophy at the end of the championship as a joke.
translation.zh: 没人会拿NBA的冠军奖杯开玩笑

translation.en: Like Quillin did, you live and die with those decisions.
translation.zh: 就像奎林 你做出的决定事关生死

translation.en: [Quillin] I mean, I'm 31-0.
translation.zh: 我的纪录是31-0

translation.en: That record got me to that title.
translation.zh: 这样的纪录能让我得冠军

translation.en: It got me to the title. You know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 能让我得冠军 明白吗？

translation.en: And then, for me to...
translation.zh: 对我来说

translation.en: not lose sight of that,
translation.zh: 不要忽略这一点

translation.en: lets me know that I appreciate the work I did.
translation.zh: 让我知道我欣赏自己所做的努力

translation.en: I mean, trying less than your best is never good enough.
translation.zh: 不竭尽全力永远不够

translation.en: I will feel bad about myself if I didn't give it my all,
translation.zh: 如果不竭尽全力 自我感觉会很糟糕

translation.en: but I know I gave it my all.
translation.zh: 但现在我知道自己尽力了

translation.en: [announcer] Introducing first, the red corner...
translation.zh: 有请第一位选手 红方…

translation.en: As a professional, he stands undefeated, 31 victories,
translation.zh: 作为一名职业拳手他有31次不败的纪录

translation.en: 22 by knockout, with no defeats.
translation.zh: 22次击倒 没有败绩

translation.en: Introducing Peter "Kid Chocolate" Quillin.
translation.zh: 有请彼得“巧克力小子”奎林

translation.en: [announcer] Across the ring, his opponent tonight, Andy Lee.
translation.zh: 拳击台的对面是他今晚的对手安迪李

translation.en: [man] Get him!
translation.zh: 打他！

translation.en: Get him, Pete! Get him, Pete! Fight!
translation.zh: 打他！彼得！打啊！

translation.en: Get him, Pete!
translation.zh: 打他 彼得！

translation.en: Get him, Pete!
translation.zh: 打他 彼得！

translation.en: [man 2] Hook him, Andy!
translation.zh: 出钩拳 安迪！

translation.en: [man] Come on, Petey!
translation.zh: 加油 彼得！

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen, having gone the distance inside the ring,
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 拳击台上已见分晓

translation.en: we'll go to your official judges' scorecards.
translation.zh: 我们看看官方裁判的记分卡

translation.en: [Bulger] If a fight goes the full 12-round distance,
translation.zh: 在打满12回合的比赛中

translation.en: the outcome is determined by three judges.
translation.zh: 结果由三名裁判决定

translation.en: The advantage to knocking out your opponent
translation.zh: 击倒对手的优势

translation.en: is that you keep it out of their hands.
translation.zh: 是让他们无法把控

translation.en: They all see it from a different angle.
translation.zh: 他们都从不同角度看着

translation.en: [announcer] Your third and final judge at ringside
translation.zh: 拳击场边的第三位也是最后一位裁判

translation.en: scores the fight 113-113.
translation.zh: 打出的分数是113比113 平局

translation.en: -He has it even. -[crowd roaring]
The fight is declared a split draw.
translation.zh: 这场比赛的结果是平局

translation.en: -[man] What happened? -[Brad Bose] That's no draw.
translation.zh: -什么情况？-才不是平局

translation.en: No draw there, I'll tell you that.
translation.zh: 没有平局 我告诉你

translation.en: [man] Kiss his ass.
translation.zh: 拍他的马屁去吧

translation.en: [Bose] This is the problem with boxing, right here.
translation.zh: 这就是拳击的问题

translation.en: [Watson] Kid Chocolate beat him fair and square.
translation.zh: 巧克力小子跟他打成了平局

translation.en: Knocked him down three times. Beat his ass good.
translation.zh: 三次把他击倒 把他打得落花流水

translation.en: But... the white boy was strong. He was tough.
translation.zh: 但白人孩子很强 他太强了

translation.en: Andy Lee's a tough guy. He's a great fighter.
translation.zh: 安迪李很强 他是个优秀的拳击手

translation.en: [Quillin] This was just a chess match.
translation.zh: 这简直像国际象棋

translation.en: This wasn't checkers. This was chess.
translation.zh: 不是跳棋 是国际象棋

translation.en: You know, with the year off,
translation.zh: 离开一年后

translation.en: I never like to look for excuses for why I did bad.
translation.zh: 我从来不喜欢为自己的糟糕表现找借口

translation.en: I like to look for excuses why I should do better.
translation.zh: 我喜欢找怎么做得更好的理由

translation.en: And this is just part of my chapter that I'ma always remember.
translation.zh: 这只是我记忆中的一部分

translation.en: [Awesome] When I lose a fight,
translation.zh: 我输了一场比赛时

translation.en: it bothers me more than anything else in the world bothers me.
translation.zh: 这比世界上的任何事都让我烦恼

translation.en: I just really like winning.
translation.zh: 我只想赢

translation.en: [Bulger] I mean, you can't win everything, though. You know?
translation.zh: 但你不能什么都赢 知道吗？

translation.en: Mmm... You can't win everything is... I feel like that's a cop-out.
translation.zh: 你不能什么都赢…我感觉那是逃避

translation.en: 'Cause if you can't win everything...
translation.zh: 因为你不能什么都赢…

translation.en: Actually, technically, you can win everything.
translation.zh: 事实上 从理论上说你可以什么都赢

translation.en: It's hard to win everything.
translation.zh: 但事实上很难什么都赢

translation.en: And you have to strive for perfection, and perfection is almost impossible.
translation.zh: 你必须力臻完美完美几乎是不可能的

translation.en: But I think saying, "You can't win everything,"
translation.zh: 但说：“你不能什么都赢”

translation.en: is just a cop-out for losing sometimes.
translation.zh: 这只是有时候输了逃避的借口

translation.en: [trainer] Yep, yep, don't give up. No, no, no. Five more. Max it up.
translation.zh: 对 别放弃 再做五个 做到位

translation.en: Five. Come on.
translation.zh: 五个 加油

translation.en: [Bulger] After losing the National Golden Gloves Championship
translation.zh: 输了全美金手套冠军赛

translation.en: at Super Heavyweight,
translation.zh: 超重量级冠军后

translation.en: Cam F. Awesome made a decision to lose 20 pounds
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森决定减重9公斤

translation.en: and try to qualify for the Olympic trials at the next weight class down.
translation.zh: 努力进入下一体重级别的奥运会选拔赛

translation.en: [Awesome] Moving down in weight, I get to fight guys my own size and I feel so much better.
translation.zh: 降了体重级别 我的对手就是跟我体型相当的人 我感觉会好很多

translation.en: [John] He's 20 pounds lighter, he's in better condition.
translation.zh: 他减了9公斤 状态更好了

translation.en: He doesn't have a belly like I do.
translation.zh: 他现在没有肚腩了 我还有

translation.en: He hasn't really looked like a top athlete.
translation.zh: 他一直不像一流的运动员

translation.en: Now he does.
translation.zh: 现在像了

translation.en: [Bulger] In winning this tournament in Colorado Springs,
translation.zh: （赢-322 输-27） 在科泉市赢了锦标赛

translation.en: Cam F. Awesome becomes the only American
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森就成了唯一一个

translation.en: to qualify for the Olympic trials in two different weight classes.
translation.zh: 获得奥运选拔赛两个不同级别参赛资格的美国选手

translation.en: [Awesome] I'm smarter, I'm more mature, I'm more disciplined.
translation.zh: 我现在更聪明 更成熟 也更自律了

translation.en: I've got my mind right, I've got my body right.
translation.zh: 我现在心态和身体都调整好了

translation.en: I'm emotionally there.
translation.zh: 我已经情系赛场

translation.en: I'm a lot more secure now than I used to be.
translation.zh: 我现在比以前更有把握

translation.en: And I'm confident in myself and my abilities to bring home a medal.
translation.zh: 我相信自己和自己的能力能为美国赢回一枚奖牌

translation.en: ♪ My heart cold 'Cause I grew up without my father ♪
translation.zh: 我的心冷了因为我没有爸爸陪着长大

translation.en: ♪ But it really made me smarter It made me grind harder ♪
translation.zh: 但这让我更聪明 让我更努力

translation.en: ♪ I would make my dreams a reality ♪
translation.zh: 我要让自己梦想成真

translation.en: ♪ Own family thought They was gon' have to bury me ♪
translation.zh: 我的家人以为要将我埋葬

translation.en: ♪ Took my mama nine months Just for her to carry me ♪
translation.zh: 我妈妈辛苦怀胎九月

translation.en: ♪ So I was brought to the world To live like yo majesty, nigga ♪
translation.zh: 我被带到这个世上要活得像君王 黑人

translation.en: [Colbert] Atlas Cops and Kids really is, like, the best gym.
translation.zh: 阿特拉斯警察和小孩是最好的拳击馆

translation.en: A lot of us is at the top of the sport, like in amateur-wise
translation.zh: 很多业余拳击手都已经登峰造极

translation.en: or, like, making our way up in the pros.
translation.zh: 或者直接转做职业拳手

translation.en: Me and Sosa, we're rising superstars.
translation.zh: 我和索萨 我们要打造超级巨星

translation.en: It's great.
translation.zh: 很棒

translation.en: And look at me now. Now I'm a Mexican. A black Mexican.
translation.zh: 看我现在 我是墨西哥人墨西哥黑人

translation.en: [Sosa] We're like a family. He wants to be part of that.
translation.zh: 我们像一家人 他想成为家里的一员

translation.en: He tells me, you know, "I'm gonna wear the Mexican hat.
translation.zh: 他说：“我要戴墨西哥帽子

translation.en: I'm gonna wear the poncho."
translation.zh: 我要穿斗篷”

translation.en: Yeah, you could say he's a black Mexican now.
translation.zh: 对 你可以说他现在是墨西哥黑人了

translation.en: -[in Spanish] The Black Bean. [chuckles] -[Bulger repeats in Spanish]
translation.zh: 黑豆

translation.en: -[announcer] Chris "B-Hop" Colbert! -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: 克里斯“B霍普”科尔伯特 （赢-4 输-0）

translation.en: [Sosa] The potential is there.
translation.zh: 潜力摆在那呢

translation.en: And if he continues to listen and train hard and all that,
translation.zh: 如果他继续听从意见 努力训练

translation.en: he will be a champion.
translation.zh: 他一定会是冠军

translation.en: He could be a great champion, too. One of the elite ones.
translation.zh: 他也可以成为伟大的拳击手精英拳手

translation.en: -How'd you get there? -Took a cab.
translation.zh: -你怎么过去的？-打出租车

translation.en: Waste of money.
translation.zh: 浪费钱

translation.en: 'Cause y'all take too long. He talks too much.
translation.zh: 因为你们耽搁太久 他说太多话了

translation.en: [Russo] I gotta just make sure he realizes that it's a business,
translation.zh: 我必须确保他明白这是生意

translation.en: that it's how you're gonna feed your family.
translation.zh: 事关你如何养家 （克里斯多夫科尔伯特的顾问）

translation.en: And how you gotta handle your money. It's like a business.
translation.zh: 你如何管钱 就像一门生意

translation.en: Why do you need $200?
translation.zh: 你为什么需要200美元？

translation.en: -[Colbert] I need it. -For?
translation.zh: -就是需要呗-用来？

translation.en: I gotta get something.
translation.zh: 我要买东西

translation.en: What? Stupidity?
translation.zh: 什么东西？蠢货？

translation.en: No, I gotta get some sneakers for somebody.
translation.zh: 我要给别人买双运动鞋

translation.en: -Oh, get the hell outta here. -Not for me.
translation.zh: -出去-不是给我自己买

translation.en: I have to buy these sneakers, though.
translation.zh: 但我必须买这双运动鞋

translation.en: -I ain't giving it to you. -They're like $50, though.
translation.zh: -我才不给你-不过差不多只要50美元

translation.en: I thought you needed it for the ID.
translation.zh: 我觉得你需要钱办身份证

translation.en: Yeah, the ID, too. The ID's not that much.
translation.zh: 对 身份证也是 但身份证没那么贵

translation.en: The most is gonna be, like, $50 for the cab and the ID.
translation.zh: 50美元就能打车和办身份证了

translation.en: So, I'm only giving you $100.
translation.zh: 那我只给你100美元

translation.en: -What? -I'm only giving you $100 then.
translation.zh: -什么？-那我只给你100美元

translation.en: No, no, no. $200.
translation.zh: 不行 要200美元

translation.en: Then the extra $50 is gonna last me for the week.
translation.zh: 剩下50美元够我这星期用了

translation.en: Still need a ride?
translation.zh: 还要打车吗？

translation.en: -It's $1,000, right? It's $1,000 left. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 是1000美元 对吗？还剩1000美元

translation.en: [chuckles] Nobody makes money overnight. It's...
translation.zh: 没人能一夜暴富 这…

translation.en: Nobody. Nobody has done it, made money...
translation.zh: 没人能做到一夜暴富…

translation.en: It takes... it takes years.
translation.zh: 需要…好几年

translation.en: You build up a record and get well-known and stay out of trouble.
translation.zh: 你累积纪录 名气 不要惹麻烦

translation.en: [Colbert] All aboard!
translation.zh: 上车了！

translation.en: [Bulger] You could say in boxing, to be the best, you've got to get beat up by the best.
translation.zh: 可以这么说 在拳击界要成为最强 就必须被最强的拳手打

translation.en: So after four wins and little prize money,
translation.zh: 赢了四次并获得为数不多的奖金后

translation.en: Lil B-Hop drops out of high school and heads down to Florida,
translation.zh: 利尔B霍普从高中退学并前往佛罗里达… （佛罗里达州劳德代尔堡）

translation.en: taking a job as the sparring partner
translation.zh: …找了一份拳击陪练的工作

translation.en: for the bantamweight champion of the world, Carlos Payano,
translation.zh: 陪最轻量级世界冠军卡洛斯帕亚诺练拳

translation.en: who's preparing to defend his title.
translation.zh: 他正在为捍卫自己的冠军地位做准备

translation.en: Fort Lauderdale Beach.
translation.zh: 劳德代尔堡海滩

translation.en: [Bulger] You took the day off today and chilled?
translation.zh: 你今天请假休息了？

translation.en: So what? I'm not fighting.
translation.zh: 那又怎样？我又不比赛

translation.en: I just came out here to spar and chill.
translation.zh: 我就是来这做陪练 顺便休息一下

translation.en: I ain't come here to work out. This not my camp.
translation.zh: 我又不是来训练 这里不是我的营地

translation.en: I'm not with these people. My coach is not here.
translation.zh: 我不跟他们一伙儿 我的教练不在这

translation.en: [Bulger] So you're not really taking it seriously?
translation.zh: 你不是认真的吧？

translation.en: No. It's sparring.
translation.zh: 不是 陪练而已

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: [Bulger] Right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -[man] Do you believe in vacation? -[Colbert] No.
translation.zh: -你相信假期吗？-不信

translation.en: [man] Shut the hell up! This ain't vacation, boy.
translation.zh: 闭嘴吧！这又不是度假

translation.en: You're a sparring partner right now.
translation.zh: 你是拳击陪练

translation.en: -This ain't no vacation. -I don't give a fuck about no sparring.
translation.zh: -这不是假期-我他妈才不管什么陪练

translation.en: -I don't give a fuck about this, nigga. -Yeah, right.
translation.zh: -我他妈才不管-好

translation.en: I could be on vacation and still go spar.
translation.zh: 我可以既度假又陪练

translation.en: I'll go on vacation, a real vacation, and still go to the gym.
translation.zh: 我要真的去度假 还要去拳击馆

translation.en: I'll find a gym and hit it.
translation.zh: 我会找个拳击馆让他们收我

translation.en: This man don't believe in this shit, bro.
translation.zh: 这人不相信这事 哥们

translation.en: Chris, you know, I mean, he could do everything wrong right now
translation.zh: 克里斯 他现在做什么都可能是错的

translation.en: and still probably fight and do well in four-round fights.
translation.zh: 但在四回合的比赛中他还是可以打好 （拳击教练 赫尔曼凯塞多）

translation.en: But you get to six, eight, ten and twelve-round fights,
translation.zh: 但还有六 八 十 十二个回合

translation.en: it don't matter how old you are, it catches up to you.
translation.zh: 不管你是什么年纪总要面对这些比赛

translation.en: Your body's putting out what you put into it.
translation.zh: 你必须有投入才有产出

translation.en: So if you got Snickers and McDonald's, that's what's coming out.
translation.zh: 如果你吃的是士力架和麦当劳结果可想而知

translation.en: There's no room in this business for half-assing.
translation.zh: 这个行业不能容忍半途而废的人 （胡安卡洛斯帕亚诺）

translation.en: [Colbert muffled] I'm the motherfucking world champion.
translation.zh: 我他妈是世界冠军

translation.en: -[man] What? What'd you say? -I'm the motherfucking world champion.
translation.zh: -什么？你说什么？-我他妈是世界冠军

translation.en: -[man] That's right. -That's me.
translation.zh: -没错-就是我

translation.en: Hup! Twelve, go! [whistling]
[Payano in Spanish] In the end, I am responsible for my training.
translation.zh: 最后 我要为自己的训练负责

translation.en: To prepare physically and mentally for my fight.
translation.zh: 为比赛做好心理和身体上的准备

translation.en: You need to sacrifice yourself and have the desire to be a champion.
translation.zh: 你必须自我牺牲必须有成为冠军的意愿

translation.en: [Herman Caicedo in English] As you saw, my champ runs guys out of the ring.
translation.zh: 你几乎没看到我的冠军会让其他人都出局

translation.en: If I just use Chris for traditional six or eight straight rounds,
translation.zh: 如果我只让克里斯去打六回合或八回合的比赛

translation.en: he probably right now wouldn't get it.
translation.zh: 他可能打不下来

translation.en: He'd get hurt or he'd just get demoralized.
translation.zh: 他会受伤 会泄气

translation.en: Every time, for this fight, every time, work, work hard, work, work.
translation.zh: 每次训练 你都必须非常努力

translation.en: [Caicedo] This is where the champ lives. This is his chamber. And he has to clean the bathroom twice a week.
translation.zh: 这就是冠军住的地方他每星期打扫洗手间两次

translation.en: And that's his job and there's no getting around that.
translation.zh: 这是他的任务 房间很挤

translation.en: And he's got photos of his family and this is...
translation.zh: 他摆了家人的照片 这是…

translation.en: And he's the world champ and he's making a decent penny on his next fight.
translation.zh: 他是世界冠军下次比赛他会赢得可观的奖金

translation.en: And he's not moving out.
translation.zh: 他不搬出去

translation.en: -You wouldn't come move in there. -Hell no.
translation.zh: -你不搬进去-才不

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: That's the mentality.
translation.zh: 这就是心态

translation.en: [Caicedo] That's our generation today. They feel like they're entitled.
translation.zh: 这就是我们这一代人他们觉得自己有权利

translation.en: I tell my guys in a minute, I tell my champion, "Stay humble."
translation.zh: 我马上告诉我的拳手们我告诉我的冠军：“谦虚点”

translation.en: And if you don't have people around you that tell you these things, and tell you, "You're not shit..."
translation.zh: 如果没人跟你说这种话那就说：“你什么都不是”

translation.en: Can you buy me a house, a car, and a freakin', you know, an island?
translation.zh: 给我买栋房子 买辆车再买个岛 行吗？

translation.en: Can you do that? You can't do that, right?
translation.zh: 行吗？肯定不行

translation.en: [Colbert] I struggled a lot. He got the best of me.
translation.zh: 我很挣扎 他让我发挥出最大的潜力

translation.en: I ain't think he had that much skills.
translation.zh: 我以前觉得他没那么多能力

translation.en: But that's what happens when you play around and you take shit for granted.
translation.zh: 当你到处打比赛想当然的时候 就会这样

translation.en: I just realized that
translation.zh: 我只发现

translation.en: when you make your way up, you gotta start stepping it up.
translation.zh: 你往上走的时候 必须加快步伐

translation.en: One round at a time, one day at a time, one step at a time.
translation.zh: 一次一个回合 一次打一天一步一个脚印

translation.en: I'm not at the world championship level yet,
translation.zh: 我还没到世界冠军的水平

translation.en: but I know I can hang with a lot of world champions.
translation.zh: 但我知道我能跟很多个世界冠军打

translation.en: To be honest, I don't know the best in me.
translation.zh: 说真的 我不清楚自己的最大潜力

translation.en: But, you know, it takes me. I could bring the best out of me.
translation.zh: 但我有潜力我会发挥自己最大的潜力

translation.en: [Leonard] It's a certain mentality that it takes to be a great fighter.
translation.zh: 要成为伟大的拳击手心态当然很重要

translation.en: And it's there. It's there in all of us. We all possess that thing.
translation.zh: 所有人都要面对这个问题我们都得处理好心态

translation.en: But what separates us is there are people who can activate it...
translation.zh: 但能把人区分开的是有人能激活自己的心态

translation.en: and become champion.
translation.zh: 成为冠军

translation.en: [announcer] Good afternoon, ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 下午好 女士们 先生们

translation.en: and welcome to the Silver Legacy Hotel Resort and Casino.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到银色遗产赌场度假村

translation.en: This afternoon, 28 men will continue their quest for the Olympic dream.
translation.zh: 今天 28名男选手将继续追逐他们的奥运梦想

translation.en: [Bulger] After a year of Olympic trials qualifiers,
translation.zh: 经过历时一年的奥运选拔赛资格赛

translation.en: the top American Olympic boxing hopefuls are here in Reno
translation.zh: 最顶级的美国奥运拳击选手已经来到里诺

translation.en: to compete to make the US team.
translation.zh: 他们要在这里争夺入选美国奥运代表队的资格

translation.en: The group includes Darmani Rock, Philadelphia's super heavyweight
translation.zh: 参赛选手有费城的超重量级拳手达玛尼洛克

translation.en: who beat Cam F. Awesome in the National Golden Gloves Championship.
translation.zh: 他在全美金手套冠军赛上击败了卡姆F傲森

translation.en: -But tonight, it only takes one punch... -[crowd exclaims] ...to end Darmani's Olympic dreams.
translation.zh: 但今晚 只要一拳就能终结达玛尼洛克的奥运梦想

translation.en: What, I can't fight?
translation.zh: 什么 我不能打？

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [John] This silly rule for boxing without headgear.
translation.zh: 不戴头盔这种规定真是蠢

translation.en: People get hurt, Cam got cut a little bit last night.
translation.zh: 有人会受伤 昨晚卡姆就受了轻伤

translation.en: But we got it fixed up, so...
translation.zh: 但我们给他治疗了 所以…

translation.en: But he's gotta worry about that a little, he's got to protect it.
translation.zh: 他会为此担心 他必须保护伤口

translation.en: So that just adds another dimension to it.
translation.zh: 这就给他增加了难度

translation.en: [woman] Can anyone, like, have a serious conversation with you
translation.zh: 谁能跟你严肃地讲话啊？

translation.en: [laughs] with your freaking drawn-on eyebrow?
translation.zh: 你那个粘上去的眼皮真让人抓狂

translation.en: So ridiculous.
translation.zh: 太搞笑了

translation.en: [Bulger] At his new 201-pound weight class, Cam F. Awesome, he looks awesome.
translation.zh: 新参加91.17公斤体重级别卡姆F傲森状态非常好

translation.en: But with the cut over his eye, and three fights left,
translation.zh: 但因为眼睛受了伤还有三场比赛没打

translation.en: he'll have to proceed with caution or risk medical disqualification.
translation.zh: 他必须非常谨慎 或者冒着因身体问题被取消资格的危险

translation.en: [man] There you go.
translation.zh: 打得好

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[announcer] Cam Awesome.
translation.zh: （赢-325 输-28） 卡姆傲森

translation.en: [John] You're a fucking magician. Your eye is perfect.
translation.zh: 你简直是魔术师 你的眼睛完全没事

translation.en: I have never been so impressed in my fucking life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子从没这么感动过

translation.en: [announcer] Your winner by split decision,
translation.zh: 通过比数判定

translation.en: boxing out of the blue corner, Cam Awesome!
translation.zh: 胜利者是蓝方 卡姆傲森！

translation.en: [Mike Martino] Watching Cam in his skill set get to this level is incredible.
translation.zh: 看到卡姆和他的技术进步到这种水平 真是了不起

translation.en: He's invested so much into this. If he wins, it was all worth it.
translation.zh: （迈克马蒂诺） 他为此付出了很多努力如果他赢了 那是实至名归

translation.en: [Awesome] I've waited too long to fuck this up.
translation.zh: 我等这一天等得太久了

translation.en: It's a great honor to be able to go to the Olympics
translation.zh: 能够代表美国去参加奥运会

translation.en: and represent a country and all that.
translation.zh: 是莫大的荣耀

translation.en: I have to win. I'd be way too disappointed chasing this for 12 fucking years.
translation.zh: 我必须赢 我追求这个梦想12年了不赢我会很失望的

translation.en: -Oh, you're not who I thought you were. -No?
translation.zh: -你不是我以前想的那样-不是吗？

translation.en: Doesn't mean you're not a quality person though.
translation.zh: 不是说你这人不靠谱

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -If you're up, best of luck. -Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: -你入选了的话 祝你好运-谢谢

translation.en: -What weight class are you in? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -你要参加哪个级别？-重量级

translation.en: Heavyweight. You guys coming to the fights? [woman] Oh, hell, yes. All week.
translation.zh: -你们会去看比赛吗？-当然了 整个星期都去

translation.en: Are you a 201 or 201-plus?
translation.zh: 你是91.17公斤还是91.17公斤以上？

translation.en: 201, I used to be 201-plus.
translation.zh: 91.17公斤 以前是91.17公斤以上

translation.en: What did you do? Go on a damn diet?
translation.zh: 你是怎么做到的？节食？

translation.en: Yeah, I actually did. I'm a vegan.
translation.zh: 对 是的 我是素食者

translation.en: And I started working out, and running, and working out, and running...
translation.zh: 我还开始训练 跑步 训练 跑步…

translation.en: -You're vegan? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你是素食者？-对

translation.en: -Good luck to you. -Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: -祝你好运-谢谢

translation.en: I'm a protein guy.
translation.zh: 我喜欢蛋白质

translation.en: -Where are you guys from? -[woman] Here.
translation.zh: -你们是哪里人？-就是这儿的

translation.en: -Here? -[woman] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这儿？-对

translation.en: You guys know anybody fighting?
translation.zh: 认识拳击手吗？

translation.en: -[woman] We do now. -So I'm your favorite fighter here?
translation.zh: -现在认识了-这么说我是你们最喜欢的拳手？

translation.en: -[woman] Pablo, but he lost. -It was Pablo.
translation.zh: -巴勃罗 但他输了-以前是巴勃罗

translation.en: Well, I'm your favorite fighter left in the tournament.
translation.zh: 我是锦标赛剩下的拳手里你们最喜欢的

translation.en: [woman] But you're my favorite fighter left in the tournament.
translation.zh: 我是锦标赛剩下的拳手里你们最喜欢的 锦标赛剩下的拳手里 我最喜欢你

translation.en: -I'll take that. -[man laughs] [Awesome] I'll take that ten times out of ten.
translation.zh: 我笑纳了 我完全笑纳

translation.en: What are your names?
translation.zh: 你们叫什么名字？

translation.en: Nancy and Jim. What's your name?
translation.zh: 南希和吉姆 你呢？

translation.en: Nice to meet you. I'm Cam.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你们 我是卡姆

translation.en: -Oh, I know you. I've watched you, yeah. -Oh, you are Cam?
translation.zh: -我认识你 我看过你比赛 对-你是卡姆？

translation.en: -Hey, I got a question for you. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -嘿 我有个问题要问你-问吧 先生

translation.en: Is your last name really...
translation.zh: 你真的姓…

translation.en: No, it isn't. You changed it.
translation.zh: 不是 你改名了

translation.en: Oh, I did change it, but I took the legal procedures.
translation.zh: 确实是改过 但是通过合法程序改的

translation.en: It's on my passport, credit card, my license.
translation.zh: 我的护照 信用卡 驾照上都用这个名字

translation.en: -Because, why not, right? -[man] Why not?
translation.zh: -改改有什么不好呢 对吧？-无妨

translation.en: [Bulger] Cam F. Awesome might not be the prettiest fighter to watch in the ring,
translation.zh: 卡姆傲森可能不是拳击台上最帅的拳手

translation.en: but he knows how to land a punch without receiving a punch,
translation.zh: 但他知道如何打人 而不被人打

translation.en: and that's all that matters.
translation.zh: 这才是最重要的

translation.en: [announcer] Boxing out of the red corner, he comes from Lenexa, Kansas,
translation.zh: 红方选手来自堪萨斯州莱内克萨

translation.en: Cam F. Awesome!
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森！

translation.en: [announcer] Red corner, Cam F. Awesome!
translation.zh: 红方 卡姆F傲森！ （卡姆F傲森赢-329 输-28）

translation.en: Tell the people what you did out there tonight.
translation.zh: 告诉大家你今晚表现如何

translation.en: [laughs] I dominated.
translation.zh: 我赢了

translation.en: [announcer] Cam F. Awesome, everybody.
translation.zh: 卡姆F傲森 诸位

translation.en: Great performance. United States Olympian, well deserved.
translation.zh: 表现出众 美国奥运选手 实至名归

translation.en: [Bulger] Awesome has now qualified for the US Olympic men's boxing team.
translation.zh: 傲森现在正式入选美国奥运男子拳击队

translation.en: But that's not saying he's an Olympian yet.
translation.zh: 但这不代表他已经是奥运选手

translation.en: He'll still have to go on to fight internationally to qualify for the games.
translation.zh: 他还必须去打国际比赛才能赢得参加奥运会的资格

translation.en: [Awesome] I'm just emotionally exhausted at this point.
translation.zh: 此刻我身心俱疲

translation.en: But I'm happy, the way everything turned out.
translation.zh: 但这样的结果我很开心

translation.en: [Bulger] So, was this all worth it?
translation.zh: 这一切都值得吗？

translation.en: It was definitely all worth it, but all today is...
translation.zh: 肯定值得 但今天的一切

translation.en: is just basically me getting back to where I left off.
translation.zh: 只是我回到了曾经离开的位置

translation.en: [trainer] Ready?
translation.zh: （纽约州纽约市）

translation.en: [trainer] Go.
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: There you go. That's it.
translation.zh: 不错 就这样

translation.en: [Eric] The Andy Lee fight was a great test.
translation.zh: 跟安迪李打那场是个巨大的考验

translation.en: And I'm not being biased, but I thought he won that fight.
translation.zh: 我不是有偏见 但我觉得他赢了

translation.en: Nonetheless, it is what it is.
translation.zh: 尽管如此 事实就是这样

translation.en: We're moving on. We're looking for the next one.
translation.zh: 我们还得继续向前 期待下一场比赛

translation.en: [Quillin] I'm in the gym, working hard,
translation.zh: 我在拳击馆里刻苦训练

translation.en: just to make sure I secure what a win could look like for me.
translation.zh: 就是为了能保证赢一场属于我的比赛

translation.en: If I'ma die, what I'm doing, it's gonna be me dying trying to win.
translation.zh: 如果我要死了那也是因为我誓死要赢

translation.en: You can't just be good at something.
translation.zh: 你不会平白无故擅长某样东西

translation.en: You can't just go up there and make music and think it's good enough.
translation.zh: 你不会作出曲子来觉得已经足够好了

translation.en: You have to always go the extra length to want it.
translation.zh: 你必须付出额外的努力才能做得足够好

translation.en: Like, I was willing to sleep on, fucking, a mattress I found in the trash
translation.zh: 就像我愿意睡在从垃圾桶里捡来的烂垫子上

translation.en: to make my success work for me. You know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 只要我能成功 明白吗？

translation.en: Wasn't about girls, wasn't about nothing else in life.
translation.zh: 不是为了女孩不是为了人生中的其他东西

translation.en: You know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 你明白我的话吗？

translation.en: So, in life, you have to figure out what you're motivated over.
translation.zh: 你必须弄清楚是什么激励着你

translation.en: -[Bulger] When you realize your situation. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 必须清楚自己的处境

translation.en: You realize where you're at and your situation
translation.zh: 对 必须清楚自己的处境

translation.en: and how you're gonna get up out of it.
translation.zh: 明白如何摆脱现状

translation.en: 'Cause you notice that you be in a pool full of crabs
translation.zh: 你发现自己在一个满是螃蟹的池塘里

translation.en: and you don't know why you keep getting pulled in,
translation.zh: 却不知道为什么要被拉进去

translation.en: it's because you have no plan to get out. You know what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 因为你没有出来的打算 知道吗？

translation.en: And then eventually, you'd be, like, 35, and you're like, "What happened?"
translation.zh: 最后到35岁了你问：“怎么回事？”

translation.en: And you was so much in the fucking moment all the time that you...
translation.zh: 你浪费了那么多时间…

translation.en: Sometimes motherfuckers don't never come out that moment.
translation.zh: 有时候 人在当下就是跳不出来

translation.en: [Bulger] The latest fight in Kid Chocolate's return
translation.zh: （丹尼尔雅各布斯对彼得奎林） 最后一场奎林回来了

translation.en: gives him another chance to regain a middleweight championship belt.
translation.zh: 让他有机会重新争夺中量级冠军金腰带

translation.en: Though, this time, it's the WBA title,
translation.zh: 不过这次是WBA冠军

translation.en: held by Brooklyn fighter Danny "The Miracle Man" Jacobs.
translation.zh: 目前的冠军是布鲁克林拳手丹尼“奇迹男”雅各布斯

translation.en: [Woods] This is a 50-50 fight.
translation.zh: 这是一场胜算半对半的比赛

translation.en: For Peter Quillin, he's taken a wicked beating from hardcore fight fans.
translation.zh: 对彼得奎林来说 铁杆粉丝已经让他受挫一次

translation.en: If he wins and looks good, all is forgiven.
translation.zh: 如果他赢了 那很好一切都可以原谅

translation.en: ♪ So when Peter get in the ring He's gonna do the thing ♪
translation.zh: 彼得上了拳击台 他就会打好比赛

translation.en: ♪ Kid Chocolate, hey, hey! Kid Chocolate ♪
translation.zh: 巧克力小子 嘿！巧克力小子

translation.en: ♪ Peter is his name Boxing is his game ♪
translation.zh: 他叫彼得 他是打拳的

translation.en: ♪ He hit him with the right Then he knock them out the ring ♪
translation.zh: 他有权利打他 把他们打下拳击台

translation.en: ♪ Hey, hey, hey ♪
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: ♪ Kid Chocolate Hey, hey, hey, yes! ♪
translation.zh: 巧克力小子 嘿 好！

translation.en: Peace. And I'm out.
translation.zh: 完了 我撤了

translation.en: Floyd.
translation.zh: 弗洛伊德

translation.en: -[Mayweather] What's up, champ? -Man, I'm good. I'm blessed, man.
translation.zh: -你好吗 冠军？-老兄 我还好 很走运

translation.en: Thank you. 'Cause I'm here right now.
translation.zh: 谢谢 因为我现在到这了

translation.en: You undefeated for a reason.
translation.zh: 你不败是有道理的

translation.en: So it's obvious you've been doing something right thus far.
translation.zh: 很明显 目前来说你打得很好

translation.en: So, you know, go out there and just be at your best.
translation.zh: 那就继续上去 发挥出最好的水平

translation.en: [Quillin] Thank you, Floyd, man. Appreciate that.
translation.zh: 谢谢 弗洛伊德 哥们 感谢

translation.en: Good looking.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: Thank you for that, man.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的鼓励 哥们

translation.en: [Eric] Showtime.
translation.zh: 该上场了

translation.en: Ugly motherfucker you.
translation.zh: 你个丑八怪

translation.en: Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: [man] Yes, that's real right there.
translation.zh: 对 真的要上场了

translation.en: [announcer] Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们

translation.en: we welcome you to Barclays Center here in Brooklyn, New York,
translation.zh: 欢迎各位来到纽约布鲁克林的巴克莱中心

translation.en: for the much anticipated feature bout of the evening.
translation.zh: 来观看今晚超级值得期待的比赛

translation.en: -Peter's about to be whipped. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -彼得肯定要被打了-对

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[crowd roaring] [announcer] The referee has already stopped the fight! Mamma mia!
translation.zh: 裁判已经叫停了比赛 妈妈咪呀！

translation.en: Your whole life, your whole history,
translation.zh: 你整个一生 整个历史

translation.en: your whole career changes with one punch.
translation.zh: 整个职业生涯 一拳就能改变

translation.en: You cannot play boxing.
translation.zh: 拳击绝非儿戏 （彼得奎林赢-31 输-1 平局-1）

translation.en: [Hopkins] When you see an art, and you see a painter,
translation.zh: 看到艺术 就看到了画家

translation.en: and you see someone that's doing something of the sweet science...
translation.zh: 就是看到有人在做很暖心的事…

translation.en: They hit and not get hit, they take away and disarm a guy,
translation.zh: 他们打人和不被人打打败别人和降服别人

translation.en: and make him look... Reduce him down from a killer to nobody.
translation.zh: 让他像是…让他从杀手变得手无缚鸡之力

translation.en: From a beast to nobody.
translation.zh: 从野兽到无能之辈

translation.en: How did you do that... in that squared circle?
translation.zh: 在拳击台上是怎么做到的？

translation.en: Hey, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 哥们

translation.en: [Quillin] This fight was meant to happen.
translation.zh: 这场比赛注定要来

translation.en: No matter what I could have did wrong,
translation.zh: 无论我打得不好

translation.en: what I could have did right.
translation.zh: 还是打得好

translation.en: It was all supposed to happen the way that it did.
translation.zh: 那应该是顺其自然的结果

translation.en: [man] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: It's all part of your story now.
translation.zh: 这是你人生故事中的一节

translation.en: Walk out of here with a smile on your face.
translation.zh: 微笑着走出去

translation.en: [De La Hoya] I believe that if a fighter goes in there and fights his heart out,
translation.zh: 我相信只要一个拳击手走上去竭尽全力地打

translation.en: and just leaves everything in the ring,
translation.zh: 在拳击台上全力以赴

translation.en: he's gonna live to see another day. He's gonna live to see another fight.
translation.zh: 那他一定能活着看到明天看到下一场比赛

translation.en: People are gonna wanna see him again, regardless if you lose or win.
translation.zh: 大家还想见到他 无论他是输还是赢

translation.en: [Bulger] Being undefeated, does it matter?
translation.zh: 保持不败 这重要吗？

translation.en: It doesn't matter. It happened the way it happened.
translation.zh: 不重要 顺其自然

translation.en: Somebody asked me, "Are you scared to get in the ring?"
translation.zh: 有人问：“你害怕上拳击台吗？”

translation.en: I said, "I'm not scared to fight, I'm not even scared to lay down.
translation.zh: 我说：“我不害怕去比赛我甚至不害怕被打倒

translation.en: The only thing I'm scared of
translation.zh: 我唯一害怕的是

translation.en: is to see how many people that's here for me right now,
translation.zh: 看到现在有多少人在这看着我

translation.en: in this moment, after I lost, disappear."
translation.zh: 一旦我输了 他们就都消失了”

translation.en: The only thing I could do is go back to the gym,
translation.zh: 我唯一能做的就是回到拳击馆

translation.en: reassess myself with my team and try our best in the next go round.
translation.zh: 重新评估我和我的团队争取尽力打好再下一场

translation.en: [Bulger] Two years in the life of American boxing
translation.zh: 在美国打两年拳击

translation.en: will teach you a lot about the sport's issues and problems...
translation.zh: 会教会你关于这项运动的很多问题

translation.en: but mostly about its champions.
translation.zh: 但大多还是关于冠军的问题

translation.en: Boxing has never been a perfect sport and it never will be.
translation.zh: 拳击从来不是完美的运动而且永远都不会完美

translation.en: But it is about people who can rise to the best of themselves
translation.zh: 但它考验的是当拳击手戴上拳套后

translation.en: when they put on the gloves.
translation.zh: 谁能表现出最佳的自我

translation.en: Like my mom always said,
translation.zh: 就像我妈妈经常说的

translation.en: it's not about how many times you've been knocked down.
translation.zh: 关键不是你被打倒多少次

translation.en: It's how fast you get up.
translation.zh: 是你站起来的速度有多快

translation.en: Boxing is about kids like me,
translation.zh: 拳击适合像我这样的孩子

translation.en: who, wherever they're from, need something only this sport can provide.
translation.zh: 不论出身 所需要的东西只有这项运动能提供

translation.en: Whether it's direction, or discipline, or glory and fame and fortune.
translation.zh: 无论是方向 纪律荣誉 名声或财富

translation.en: A champion is someone who, despite tremendous odds,
translation.zh: 冠军就是排除万难

translation.en: in a brutal, corrupt pursuit,
translation.zh: 在残酷 腐败的追逐过程中

translation.en: proves that the impossible, what most of us might never dare,
translation.zh: 证明大多数人或许永远不敢想的东西

translation.en: could actually happen.
translation.zh: 不可能会变成可能

translation.en: These dreams are still born every day in gyms like Atlas Cops and Kids.
translation.zh: 在阿特拉斯警察和小孩这样的拳击馆中 每天都有这种梦想诞生

translation.en: And as long as there are kids who need to fight their way out of somewhere...
translation.zh: 只要有孩子需要打出一条出路

translation.en: that squared circle will be calling.
translation.zh: 拳击台就会一直在召唤

translation.en: The strategy remains the same, in this, the most elemental of martial arts:
translation.zh: 还是一样的战略在这种最基本的武术中

translation.en: hit and don't be hit.
translation.zh: 要领还是打和不要被打

translation.en: [announcer] And still undefeated, Chris "Lil B-Hop" Colbert!
translation.zh: 还是拥有不败战绩的克里斯“利尔B霍普”科尔伯特！

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[man] Let's go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: Who's that?
translation.zh: 谁呀？是谁？

translation.en: Who is that?
translation.zh: （他第一次输掉比赛十个月后彼得还未跟其他对手较量过）
